original: nga'i zas de dag gi skyon gyis des phyi sa dang gcin dang mchil ma dang snabs rnams dri mi zhim par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nga'i zas de dag gi skyon gyis des phyi sa dang gcin dang mchil ma dang snabs rnams dri mi zhim par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the faults of my food will cause my excrement, urine, mucus, and phlegm to become malodorous.

original: sna'i rnag dang mig gi rnag dag kyang 'byung ngo //
analyzed: sna'i rnag dang mig gi rnag dag kyang 'byung ngo //
translated: It will also produce nasal and eye discharge.

original: srin rnams dang lhan cig kun tu tshogs par 'gyur ba de dang de dag rnams kyang srin gyis dri ngan pa rnams skyed par byed do //
analyzed: srin rnams dang lhan cig kun tu tshogs par 'gyur ba de dang de dag rnams kyang srin gyis dri ngan pa rnams skyed par byed do //
translated: The worms that live together with it will also produce bad smells.’

original: gang yang gos sam mal cha dang nam zas kyi rigs su gyur pa rnams @196b kyang rung ste so'i gseb tu song bar gyur na /
analyzed: gang yang gos sam mal cha dang nam zas kyi rigs su gyur pa rnams @196b kyang rung ste so'i gseb tu song bar gyur na /
translated: Whatever food and drink, or whatever clothes and bedding, he consumes,

original: de dag rnams srin des dri ngan pa dang ches dri ngan par 'gyur bar byed do //
analyzed: de dag rnams srin des dri ngan pa dang ches dri ngan par 'gyur bar byed do //
translated: the worms will make them foul-smelling and very malodorous.

original: mtshan mo nyal bar gyur pa'i skyon gyis kyang lce'i dri ma de shin tu dri mi zhim par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtshan mo nyal bar gyur pa'i skyon gyis kyang lce'i dri ma de shin tu dri mi zhim par 'gyur ro //
translated: The faults of sleeping at night will also make the tongue very foul-smelling.

original: lce'i dri ma rnams shin tu skya bar 'gyur ba dang lus dri ngan pa dang dri ma can du yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lce'i dri ma rnams shin tu skya bar 'gyur ba dang lus dri ngan pa dang dri ma can du yang 'gyur ro //
translated: The tongue will become very pale, and the body will become foul-smelling and dirty.

original: des yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dri ngan pa'i srin de la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang lus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rab tu rig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dri ngan pa'i srin de la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang lus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rab tu rig par 'gyur ro //
translated: By correctly observing the foul-smelling worms, he will correctly perceive the body.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /
translated: “The spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body will further wonder, ‘Are there any other worms in my body that create disease and harm, or that are harmless?’

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice, ‘There are also worms called hair-eaters.

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: With the divine eye he sees:

original: rdul la rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i srin gshul sha'i gseb na rgyu ba yin te /
analyzed: rdul la rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i srin gshul sha'i gseb na rgyu ba yin te /
translated: “The worm that moves in the dirt lives in the flesh between the tendons.

original: de gal te nga'i zas zhu bar gyur na /🔽des bdag gi rus shing gi yul phyogs kyi rus pa gsum gyi bu gu gang yin par nga'i gshang ba drangs nas 'phongs kyi mdor 'jog go /
analyzed: de gal te nga'i zas zhu bar gyur na / des bdag gi rus shing gi yul phyogs kyi rus pa gsum gyi bu gu gang yin par nga'i gshang ba drangs nas 'phongs kyi mdor 'jog go /
translated: If it digests my food,🔽it will draw my feces through the holes in the three bones in the region of the skeleton and place it in the anus.

original: rus pa gzhan gsum gyi bu gu rlan par byas shing bdag gi chu ngan gyis brlan par byas nas rtug pa'i dbyibs chen po rnams aan tong rus pa'i yul phyogs su byas nas nga'i gcin 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rus pa gzhan gsum gyi bu gu rlan par byas shing bdag gi chu ngan gyis brlan par byas nas rtug pa'i dbyibs chen po rnams aan tong rus pa'i yul phyogs su byas nas nga'i gcin 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Having moistened the holes in the other three bones, it will moisten my urine and form the shape of feces in the region of the bones of the anus and release my urine.🔽”

original: des rdul la rgyu ba'i srin la rab tu brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rab tu ring par 'gyur ro //🔽gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su @197a *//
analyzed: des rdul la rgyu ba'i srin la rab tu brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rab tu ring par 'gyur ro // gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su @197a *//
translated: In this way, examining the worm that moves in the dirt, he develops a correct understanding of the body.

original: lta zhing gnas pa na /
analyzed: lta zhing gnas pa na /
translated: Again, the spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body and observes,

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab bam /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab bam /
translated: This is known through the wisdom born from listening.

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: He sees with insight derived from hearing or through the divine eye:

original: srin gyi rigs bcu dag gi mkhris pa la gnas pa de las skyes par gyur pa /
analyzed: srin gyi rigs bcu dag gi mkhris pa la gnas pa de las skyes par gyur pa /
translated: “There are ten types of worm, born from bile,

original: lus thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par byed pa rnams ni /
analyzed: lus thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par byed pa rnams ni /
translated: that live in all my limbs.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are

original: tsu ru ba: dang sgul byed dang rdzas kyis rgyas pa dang chen po'i rigs dang nags pa dang zas chen po dang dro ba la rgyu ba dang rnam par sreg byed dang me drod nyams par byed pa dang me chen po dang ste /
analyzed: tsu ru ba: dang sgul byed dang rdzas kyis rgyas pa dang chen po'i rigs dang nags pa dang zas chen po dang dro ba la rgyu ba dang rnam par sreg byed dang me drod nyams par byed pa dang me chen po dang ste /
translated: the curu, the mover, the one that grows with substances, the great type, the forest one, the great eater, the one that moves in heat, the one that burns, the one that weakens digestive heat, and the great fire.

original: srin gyi rigs bcu po de dag rnams ni /
analyzed: srin gyi rigs bcu po de dag rnams ni /
translated: These ten types of worm

original: mkhris pa la rgyu ba dang de las skyes par gyur pa lus thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa rnams yin no //
analyzed: mkhris pa la rgyu ba dang de las skyes par gyur pa lus thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa rnams yin no //
translated: live in my bile, are born from it, and live in all my limbs.

original: bdag gi srin gang dag gis nga'i lus la rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed par 'gyur na /
analyzed: bdag gi srin gang dag gis nga'i lus la rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed par 'gyur na /
translated: What do the worms in my body do when they are in balance or out of balance?”

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab bam /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab bam /
translated: This is known through the wisdom born from listening.

original: lha'i mig gis mthong ba la /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong ba la /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or through the divine eye, he will notice

original: tsu ra ba zhes bya ba'i srin lus la rab tu gnas so //
analyzed: tsu ra ba zhes bya ba'i srin lus la rab tu gnas so //
translated: that the curuvaka worm is dwelling in his body.

original: de gal te bdag gi zas kyi skyon gyis khro ba kun nas skyes par gyur na /
analyzed: de gal te bdag gi zas kyi skyon gyis khro ba kun nas skyes par gyur na /
translated: If the worm is angered by the faults of my diet,

original: de nga'i mig gnyis kyi rdzi ma dag za bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nga'i mig gnyis kyi rdzi ma dag za bar 'gyur ro //
translated: it will eat the eyelashes of my eyes.

original: des nga la 'brum bu dang g-yan pa dag skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des nga la 'brum bu dang g-yan pa dag skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It will cause me to develop boils and scabs.

original: gal te rdzi ma gzhan rnams la za bar 'gro na mig las gyur pa'i mchi ma rab tu phal che ba yang rab tu 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gal te rdzi ma gzhan rnams la za bar 'gro na mig las gyur pa'i mchi ma rab tu phal che ba yang rab tu 'byung ngo //
translated: If it moves to another eyelash, I will develop a lot of eye discharge.

original: gal te mig la rgyu bar gyur na des bdag gi mig la nad drag po rnams skyad par byed de /
analyzed: gal te mig la rgyu bar gyur na des bdag gi mig la nad drag po rnams skyad par byed de /
translated: If it moves to my eyes, it will cause severe eye diseases.

original: mthong ba rnams @197b par nyams pa'am mig nye bar sngom par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthong ba rnams @197b par nyams pa'am mig nye bar sngom par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: I will lose my eyesight or my eyes will be covered in a film.

original: de bdag gi mig gi nang du rgyu zhing sha'i gong bur gyur pa'i mig gi tha snyad du byas pa la 'gal bar byas nas mig la gnas pa'i nur nur po la gnas par byed do //
analyzed: de bdag gi mig gi nang du rgyu zhing sha'i gong bur gyur pa'i mig gi tha snyad du byas pa la 'gal bar byas nas mig la gnas pa'i nur nur po la gnas par byed do //
translated: It moves within my eyes and is the basis for the designation ‘eye-flesh.’ It is in conflict with the other worms and remains in the eye-pupils.

original: des nga'i mig 'bras su gtogs pa'i g-yogs ma dang dmar por snang ba'ang skyed par byed do //
analyzed: des nga'i mig 'bras su gtogs pa'i g-yogs ma dang dmar por snang ba'ang skyed par byed do //
translated: It produces the white and red parts of my eyes.

original: srin 'dis ni /
analyzed: srin 'dis ni /
translated: This worm🔽always creates great pain for me.

original: rtag par rgyun du nang chen po rnams byed do; ;des tsu ra ba'i srin yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin lus so sor rig par byed do //🔽gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /
analyzed: rtag par rgyun du nang chen po rnams byed do; ;des tsu ra ba'i srin yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin lus so sor rig par byed do // gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /
translated: By properly and carefully observing the curu-worm, he knows the body properly.

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab dag gis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab dag gis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: “The spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body and observes, ‘In my body there are many different kinds of worms,’ will, with insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, observe,

original: sgul byed ces bya ba'i srin lus la gnas te /
analyzed: sgul byed ces bya ba'i srin lus la gnas te /
translated: ‘The worm called mover lives in my body.

original: mkhris pa'i nang na rgyu ba dang lus thams cad la'ang thogs pa med par 'gro bar byed pa dang / mkhris pa nyid kyis lus g-yogs pa yin no //
analyzed: mkhris pa'i nang na rgyu ba dang lus thams cad la'ang thogs pa med par 'gro bar byed pa dang / mkhris pa nyid kyis lus g-yogs pa yin no //
translated: It moves within the bile and goes everywhere in the body without obstruction, and the bile itself covers the body.

original: des gang gis kho bo'i rus pa bsregs par gyur pa shar gtogs pa'ang shin tu tsha bar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: des gang gis kho bo'i rus pa bsregs par gyur pa shar gtogs pa'ang shin tu tsha bar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: It burns my bones, and the east becomes very hot.

original: bdag gi yan lag rnams kyang dron mor 'gyur /
analyzed: bdag gi yan lag rnams kyang dron mor 'gyur /
translated: My limbs become hot.

original: bdag gi lag pa dang rkang pa gnyis kyang shin tu rnam par bsregs par gyur pa ni /
analyzed: bdag gi lag pa dang rkang pa gnyis kyang shin tu rnam par bsregs par gyur pa ni /
translated: My hands and feet are very burned.

original: nyin mo dang mtshan mo'ang rab tu zhi bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyin mo dang mtshan mo'ang rab tu zhi bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It does not subside day or night.

original: gal te pags pa la 'gro bar gyur na bdag la rdul 'byung bar 'gyur ro //🔽des sgul byed kyi srin la so sor @198a *//
analyzed: gal te pags pa la 'gro bar gyur na bdag la rdul 'byung bar 'gyur ro // des sgul byed kyi srin la so sor @198a *//
translated: If it moves on the skin, I get goose bumps.

original: brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rab tu shes so //
analyzed: brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rab tu shes so //
translated: He discerns the moving worm and understands the body as it is.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab bdag gis sam /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab bdag gis sam /
translated: Moreover, the spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: sees through wisdom derived from hearing or through the divine eye

original: bdag gi srin rdzas kyis rgyas pa zhes bya ba mkhris pa'i nang na rgyu bar gyur pa mchu shin tu rno ba rkang pa thung ba me'i lto dang nad chen por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi srin rdzas kyis rgyas pa zhes bya ba mkhris pa'i nang na rgyu bar gyur pa mchu shin tu rno ba rkang pa thung ba me'i lto dang nad chen por gyur pa'o //
translated: that the pus-swelling worm lives in the bile. It has a very sharp beak, short legs, and a large stomach.

original: de gal te shed na lus kyi yul phyogs gzhan na gnas par gyur na /
analyzed: de gal te shed na lus kyi yul phyogs gzhan na gnas par gyur na /
translated: If it moves to another part of the body,

original: nga'i zas kyi skyon gyis ltogs par gyur nas yul phyogs de dang de dag tu lus sreg par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nga'i zas kyi skyon gyis ltogs par gyur nas yul phyogs de dang de dag tu lus sreg par 'gyur ro //
translated: it will cause me to feel hungry due to the fault of my food. It will burn my body in this and that place.

original: khrag 'grim par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khrag 'grim par 'gyur ro //
translated: It will cause my blood to flow.

original: khrag skyug par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi lus thams cad kyang rang bzhin du mi gnas par me bzhin du sreg par byed do //
analyzed: khrag skyug par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi lus thams cad kyang rang bzhin du mi gnas par me bzhin du sreg par byed do //
translated: It will cause me to vomit blood, and my entire body will not be at ease, as if it were burning with fire.

original: bdag gi lus kyi pags pa rnams thams cad me'i yul du 'gyur zhing rkang pa dag la'ang 'brum bu'i thig le dang lus rnams me dang mtshungs par skyed do //
analyzed: bdag gi lus kyi pags pa rnams thams cad me'i yul du 'gyur zhing rkang pa dag la'ang 'brum bu'i thig le dang lus rnams me dang mtshungs par skyed do //
translated: The entire skin of my body becomes a domain of fire, and blisters appear on my feet, and my body is generated as if it were fire.

original: rdzas kyis rgyas pa'i srin las so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta bur lus so sor rig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdzas kyis rgyas pa'i srin las so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta bur lus so sor rig par 'gyur ro //
translated: By means of the analysis of the worm that is nourished by substances, I will correctly understand the body.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /
translated: Moreover, the spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body

original: de'i thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: de'i thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: will, with insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye,

original: rigs chen po zhes bya ba'i @198b srin lus kyi nang na rgyu bar gyur pa mkhris pa'i gseb na rgyu ba yin no //
analyzed: rigs chen po zhes bya ba'i @198b srin lus kyi nang na rgyu bar gyur pa mkhris pa'i gseb na rgyu ba yin no //
translated: see that the worm called great type moves within the body and travels through the bile.

original: de gal te nga'i zas kyi skyon gyis khro ba skyes par gyur na /
analyzed: de gal te nga'i zas kyi skyon gyis khro ba skyes par gyur na /
translated: If it becomes angry due to a fault in my food,

original: des rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci zhig byed pa yin na /
analyzed: des rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci zhig byed pa yin na /
translated: what will it do, whether it is in its normal state or not?

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye,

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: he will notice:

original: rigs chen po'i srin ni /
analyzed: rigs chen po'i srin ni /
translated: “The great-family worm moves inside my body.

original: nga'i lus kyi nang na rgyu bar gyur bas mgo nas bzung nas ji srid du rkang ba'i bar du thos pa med par 'gro ba yin te /
analyzed: nga'i lus kyi nang na rgyu bar gyur bas mgo nas bzung nas ji srid du rkang ba'i bar du thos pa med par 'gro ba yin te /
translated: Starting from my head and going all the way down to my feet, it moves without a break.

original: de bdag la khros nas lus thams cad la khrag mkhris kyi 'brum thug byed pa dang / 'dis mkhris pa dang khrag bdag gis rna ba dang sna bug gi nang dag nas khrag mkhris 'dzag par byed pas 'chi ba'i gnas skabs dang 'dra bar byed do //
analyzed: de bdag la khros nas lus thams cad la khrag mkhris kyi 'brum thug byed pa dang / 'dis mkhris pa dang khrag bdag gis rna ba dang sna bug gi nang dag nas khrag mkhris 'dzag par byed pas 'chi ba'i gnas skabs dang 'dra bar byed do //
translated: When it is angry with me, it causes boils of blood and bile all over my body, and it causes my blood and bile to flow from my ears and nose.

original: sngon por byed cing mig ser du'ang byed do //
analyzed: sngon por byed cing mig ser du'ang byed do //
translated: It turns my eyes yellow.🔽It causes my mouth to dry out.

original: des kha kha bar yang byed do; ;des rigs chen po'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des kha kha bar yang byed do; ;des rigs chen po'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par 'gyur ro //
translated: As he observes the great-family worm, he develops a correct understanding of the body.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /
translated: Moreover, when the yogi is observing the body in terms of its inner nature,🔽

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /🔽nag pa pa zhes bya ba'i srin mkhris pa skyon can rnams drangs nas lus la kun tu rgyu bar byed do //
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa / nag pa pa zhes bya ba'i srin mkhris pa skyon can rnams drangs nas lus la kun tu rgyu bar byed do //
translated: Moreover, the spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body sees with wisdom arisen from hearing or clairvoyance🔽that the black worm lives in the body.🔽If the black worm is disturbed by a fault in my bile, it will move throughout my body.

original: de gal te bdag gi zes kyi skyon gyis khro ba skyes par gyur nas lus kun la snyoms par til 'dra ba'i thig le nag po @199a *//
analyzed: de gal te bdag gi zes kyi skyon gyis khro ba skyes par gyur nas lus kun la snyoms par til 'dra ba'i thig le nag po @199a *//
translated: If it becomes angry due to a fault in my food, it will produce black spots on my body that are like sesame seeds.

original: po rnams byed pa dang / sha 'brum par byed pa'am lus la yang nag po dang ser por 'gyur ba'am dmar po'i dri rlung dang rlung dag dang mtshungs par 'jug par byed pa'am bdag gi mkhris pa'am gzhang 'joms par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: po rnams byed pa dang / sha 'brum par byed pa'am lus la yang nag po dang ser por 'gyur ba'am dmar po'i dri rlung dang rlung dag dang mtshungs par 'jug par byed pa'am bdag gi mkhris pa'am gzhang 'joms par 'gyur ro //
translated: It will cause boils, and my body will become black, yellow, or red. It will cause my bile to be disturbed, or it will cause dysentery.

original: des nag po'i srin so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin lus rab tu shes so //
analyzed: des nag po'i srin so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin lus rab tu shes so //
translated: In this way, examining the black worm, he develops a correct understanding of the body.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhig ngas pa na /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhig ngas pa na /
translated: “The spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body will also ask himself, ‘Does the great worm exist in my body? What does it do when it is in a natural state or an unnatural state?’

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice,

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa; zas chen po zhes bya ba'i srin lus la gnas te des lus rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed pa yin na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa; zas chen po zhes bya ba'i srin lus la gnas te des lus rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed pa yin na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: ‘The great worm lives in my body. What does it do when it is in a natural or an unnatural state?’

original: lha'i mig gis mthong ba ni /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong ba ni /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice,

original: zas chen po zhes bya ba'i srin zas kyi skyon gyis gal te khros par gyur na de nga'i mkhris pa'i nang na gnas pas zas zos pa dang de ltar tsha ba skyed par byed do //
analyzed: zas chen po zhes bya ba'i srin zas kyi skyon gyis gal te khros par gyur na de nga'i mkhris pa'i nang na gnas pas zas zos pa dang de ltar tsha ba skyed par byed do //
translated: ‘The great worm is affected by the faults of food. If it is angry, it will live in my bile and cause a burning sensation when I eat food.

original: de chen por gyur pas bdag gi lus rlan par 'gyur zhing zhim par gyur nas yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad dang mig dang rna ba dang sna dang bdag gi lce'i dbang po rnams kyang nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de chen por gyur pas bdag gi lus rlan par 'gyur zhing zhim par gyur nas yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad dang mig dang rna ba dang sna dang bdag gi lce'i dbang po rnams kyang nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: As it grows larger, it will make my body moist and soft, and my major and minor body parts, eyes, ears, nose, and tongue will all deteriorate.

original: rang dang rang gi yul rnams la yang lta bar mi nus par 'gyur ba dang / zas kyi skyon gyis bdag gi dbang po lnga po rnams lam ngan pa @199b la rab tu gnas par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang dang rang gi yul rnams la yang lta bar mi nus par 'gyur ba dang / zas kyi skyon gyis bdag gi dbang po lnga po rnams lam ngan pa @199b la rab tu gnas par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: I will be unable to see my own body and my own objects, and the five sense faculties will be impaired due to the fault of food.

original: des zas chen po'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des zas chen po'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par 'gyur ro //
translated: As he examines the great worm, he develops a correct understanding of the body.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab bdag gis sam /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab bdag gis sam /
translated: “The spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body will further wonder, ‘What other worms might live in my body and what harm might they cause?

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice,

original: dro ba las rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i srin ni; rtag tu zas dro ba la dga' bar gyur pa /
analyzed: dro ba las rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i srin ni; rtag tu zas dro ba la dga' bar gyur pa /
translated: The worm that moves due to heat always likes warm food

original: zas grang ba rnams la rab tu sdang ba yin no //
analyzed: zas grang ba rnams la rab tu sdang ba yin no //
translated: and hates cold food.

original: des bdag la rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed pa yin na /
analyzed: des bdag la rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed pa yin na /
translated: What does it do to me if it is in or out of balance?

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /🔽gal te bdag zas su gyur pa dag gam bza' ba dang btung ba dang bca' ba dang myang ba'ang rung ste /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa / gal te bdag zas su gyur pa dag gam bza' ba dang btung ba dang bca' ba dang myang ba'ang rung ste /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will notice,

original: grang mo dag za bar gyur na /
analyzed: grang mo dag za bar gyur na /
translated: ‘If I eat cold food, such as food, drink, edibles, or chewables,🔽that worm will be angry with me.

original: de nga la khros par gyur nas nga'i kha la ldag par yang byed pa'am /
analyzed: de nga la khros par gyur nas nga'i kha la ldag par yang byed pa'am /
translated: It will bite my mouth,

original: lus rlan pa'am lci ba'am nyams chung ba'am 'gag pa'am snying la yang ldag pa'am lus thams cad kyi skyon du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: lus rlan pa'am lci ba'am nyams chung ba'am 'gag pa'am snying la yang ldag pa'am lus thams cad kyi skyon du gyur pa ste /
translated: or it will make my body moist, heavy, weak, or blocked, or it will bite my heart or cause problems throughout my body.

original: des lud pa dmar por byed pa'am mgrin pa la lhag par byed do //
analyzed: des lud pa dmar por byed pa'am mgrin pa la lhag par byed do //
translated: It will cause red phlegm or a goiter.’

original: des dro ba las rgyu ba'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus la so sor brtags pa yin no //
analyzed: des dro ba las rgyu ba'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus la so sor brtags pa yin no //
translated: In this way, examining the moving worm, he has a correct understanding of the body.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i @200a *//🔽shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na / des thos pa las byung ba'i @200a *// shes rab kyis sam /
translated: “The spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body will also wonder, ‘What are the worms that live in my body and what do they do to me?’

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice,

original: rnam par sreg byed ces bya ba'i srin lus kyi mkhris pa'i gnas la rab tu gnas pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam par sreg byed ces bya ba'i srin lus kyi mkhris pa'i gnas la rab tu gnas pa yin la /
translated: ‘The worm that is called the burner lives in the bile of my body.

original: des nga la rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed pa yin na /
analyzed: des nga la rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed pa yin na /
translated: It may or may not be in a natural state. What does it do to me when it is or is not in a natural state?’

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa sreg byed kyi srin bdag gi lus la gnas pa las /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa sreg byed kyi srin bdag gi lus la gnas pa las /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice, ‘The burner worm lives in my body.

original: gal te ngas zas lci mo gang dag zos par gyur na nga'i zas de dag gi skyon gyis rnam par sreg byed kyi srin gyis mes sreg par byed do //
analyzed: gal te ngas zas lci mo gang dag zos par gyur na nga'i zas de dag gi skyon gyis rnam par sreg byed kyi srin gyis mes sreg par byed do //
translated: If I eat heavy foods, the fire-coinciding worm will burn me because of the fault of those foods.

original: stobs lhag pa nyid dang rtse'u chung la gnod par 'gyur ba dang zas kyi khams shin tu che bas mgrin par thogs par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stobs lhag pa nyid dang rtse'u chung la gnod par 'gyur ba dang zas kyi khams shin tu che bas mgrin par thogs par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: The worm will be stronger and will harm my kidneys, and the great element of food will block my throat.

original: bdag gi bshang ba'ang skya bor 'gyur zhing chung na yang ji lta bar te /
analyzed: bdag gi bshang ba'ang skya bor 'gyur zhing chung na yang ji lta bar te /
translated: My feces will be pale and small.

original: bdag grang ba la dga' ba nyid du'ang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag grang ba la dga' ba nyid du'ang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: I will not enjoy cold things.

original: zas mngar mo rnams la 'dor ba yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zas mngar mo rnams la 'dor ba yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: I will not reject sweet foods.

original: des rnam par sreg byed kyi srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rab tu shes so //
analyzed: des rnam par sreg byed kyi srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rab tu shes so //
translated: By examining the fire-coinciding worm, the spiritual practitioner has knowledge of the body as it is.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa ni /
translated: The Spiritual Practitioner who carefully observes his body and attends to it in this way will ask himself: What kind of worms live in my body?

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: Through the wisdom arising from hearing or

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: through the divine eye one sees:

original: me drod nyams par byed pa zhes bya ba'i srin nga'i lus la mkhris pa dang lhan cig skyes nas gnas te /🔽de la dga' ba dang de grang ba'i dus na ni /
analyzed: me drod nyams par byed pa zhes bya ba'i srin nga'i lus la mkhris pa dang lhan cig skyes nas gnas te / de la dga' ba dang de grang ba'i dus na ni /
translated: The worm that causes the heat of fire to decline lives in the stomach together with bile.🔽If it is happy,

original: @200b dga' bar 'gyur ro //🔽dro ba'i dus na ni /
analyzed: @200b dga' bar 'gyur ro // dro ba'i dus na ni /
translated: it will be happy when it is cold.🔽If it is unhappy,

original: rgud par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgud par 'gyur ro //
translated: it will be unhappy when it is cold.

original: grang ba'i dus na'ang rab tu dga' bar gyur nas bdag zas 'dod par byed do //
analyzed: grang ba'i dus na'ang rab tu dga' bar gyur nas bdag zas 'dod par byed do //
translated: When it is cold, it will be very happy and will make me want food.

original: dro ba'i dus na ni /
analyzed: dro ba'i dus na ni /
translated: When it is warm,

original: me drod nyams par byed do //
analyzed: me drod nyams par byed do //
translated: it will cause the heat of fire to decline.

original: grang ba'i dus na yang nga'i mkhris pa legs par sgrub par byed cing dro ba'i dus na ni /
analyzed: grang ba'i dus na yang nga'i mkhris pa legs par sgrub par byed cing dro ba'i dus na ni /
translated: When it is cold, it will make my bile good, but when it is warm

original: sun 'don pa yin no //
analyzed: sun 'don pa yin no //
translated: it will cause it to decline.

original: de'i skyon gyis ni /
analyzed: de'i skyon gyis ni /
translated: Through its faults

original: me drod nyams par byed do //
analyzed: me drod nyams par byed do //
translated: it causes the heat of fire to decline.

original: des me drod nyams par byed pa'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do //
analyzed: des me drod nyams par byed pa'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do //
translated: Examining the worm that weakens the digestive heat, he develops a correct understanding of the body.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: “The spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body will also ask himself, ‘Are there any other worms in my body that cause disease and pain, and that are harmful to my health and well-being?’

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa me chen po zhes bya ba'i srin lus la gnas te /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa me chen po zhes bya ba'i srin lus la gnas te /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice, ‘The worm called great fire lives in my body.

original: des nga la rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed pa yin na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: des nga la rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed pa yin na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: It causes me to be either healthy or unhealthy.’

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa ni /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa ni /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice,

original: nga'i srin me chen po zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: nga'i srin me chen po zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‘The worm called great fire

original: zas 'gal ba zos pa rnams thams cad 'dod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zas 'gal ba zos pa rnams thams cad 'dod par 'gyur ro //
translated: likes to eat food that is not suitable.

original: gal te yang rang ltogs par gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te yang rang ltogs par gyur na ni /
translated: If I am hungry,

original: des nga'i lus kyi gseb tu gyur pa'i srin rnams za bar byed do //
analyzed: des nga'i lus kyi gseb tu gyur pa'i srin rnams za bar byed do //
translated: The worms that live in my body will eat it.

original: srin de'i skyon gyis bdag la 'dir lhang kyog 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srin de'i skyon gyis bdag la 'dir lhang kyog 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of the fault of the worms, I will experience pain here.

original: rgyab du gzer bar 'gyur ba'am lag pa la zug gzer yang rung ste /
analyzed: rgyab du gzer bar 'gyur ba'am lag pa la zug gzer yang rung ste /
translated: I will experience pain in my back, or pain in my arms,

original: yul phyogs gang du srin rnams za bar byed pa'i yul phyogs de dang de dag rnams @201a *//
analyzed: yul phyogs gang du srin rnams za bar byed pa'i yul phyogs de dang de dag rnams @201a *//
translated: or wherever the worms are eating.

original: su gzer zug skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: su gzer zug skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Pain will arise in those places.

original: des mkhris pa la gnas pa'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rab tu rid par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des mkhris pa la gnas pa'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rab tu rid par 'gyur ro //
translated: “ ‘As he examines the worms that live in the bile, he will develop a correct understanding of the body’s decay.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: “ ‘The spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body will further wonder, “What other worms are present in my body and what functions do they perform?”

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice,

original: rus pa las gyur pa'i dang / tshil la gnas pa'i srin gyi rigs 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rus pa las gyur pa'i dang / tshil la gnas pa'i srin gyi rigs 'di lta ste /
translated: “There are worms that live in the bones and worms that live in the fat.

original: rus pa la ldag pa dang shin tu 'drud byed dang tshigs pa gcod cing rgyu ba dang dri mi zhim pa dang rus pa'i rnag gi rigs dang kha dmar ba dang myang bar byed pa dang pags pa za ba dang grog ma dang spu gri'i kha dang rnams
analyzed: rus pa la ldag pa dang shin tu 'drud byed dang tshigs pa gcod cing rgyu ba dang dri mi zhim pa dang rus pa'i rnag gi rigs dang kha dmar ba dang myang bar byed pa dang pags pa za ba dang grog ma dang spu gri'i kha dang rnams
translated: The types of worms that live in the bones are the gnawers, the great gnawers, the joint-cutters, the stinking, the pus-eaters, the red-mouths, the tasters, the skin-eaters, the ants, and the razor-mouths.

original: so // de la nga'i rus pa las gyur pa'i srin rnams kyis rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed pa yin na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab bam /
analyzed: so // de la nga'i rus pa las gyur pa'i srin rnams kyis rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed pa yin na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab bam /
translated: What do the worms that live in the bones do when they are in a normal or an abnormal condition?

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /🔽rus pa la ldag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i srin ni /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa / rus pa la ldag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i srin ni /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will notice:

original: phyi rol gyi rus pa'i rkang rnams la rab tu gnas so //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi rus pa'i rkang rnams la rab tu gnas so //
translated: The gnawers live in the outer bones.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are:

original: dpung pa'i rkang la gnas pa dang / brla'i rkang la gnas pa dang / rgyab kyi sgal ba la gnas pa rnams yin te /
analyzed: dpung pa'i rkang la gnas pa dang / brla'i rkang la gnas pa dang / rgyab kyi sgal ba la gnas pa rnams yin te /
translated: those that live in the bones of the arms, those that live in the bones of the thighs, and those that live in the bones of the back.

original: rus pa rnams thams cad kyi yang gnad rnams kyi gseb na rgyu ba yin no //
analyzed: rus pa rnams thams cad kyi yang gnad rnams kyi gseb na rgyu ba yin no //
translated: It moves in the gaps between all the bones and the vital points.

original: gal te yang de zas kyi skyon rnams kyis khro ba skyes par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te yang de zas kyi skyon rnams kyis khro ba skyes par gyur na /
translated: If it is angered by the faults of food,

original: des nga'i rus @201b par gyur pa'i lhang kyog rnams dang lus kyi mdog dang reg pa yang ngan par byed do //
analyzed: des nga'i rus @201b par gyur pa'i lhang kyog rnams dang lus kyi mdog dang reg pa yang ngan par byed do //
translated: it will make my bones crooked and my complexion and touch bad.

original: rus pa rnams sam sha rnams kyang rung ste /
analyzed: rus pa rnams sam sha rnams kyang rung ste /
translated: Whether it is the bones or the flesh,

original: rus pas bsdus pa rnams bra bar byed do //
analyzed: rus pas bsdus pa rnams bra bar byed do //
translated: it will make them all dry up.

original: des nga'i rus pa las gyur pa'i tshor ba chen po mchog tu mi bzad pa rnams bskyed do //
analyzed: des nga'i rus pa las gyur pa'i tshor ba chen po mchog tu mi bzad pa rnams bskyed do //
translated: It will produce in me a great, unbearable feeling that comes from the bones.

original: gal te yang de ltogs par ma gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te yang de ltogs par ma gyur na ni /
translated: But if it is not hungry,

original: de ji skad du bshad pa'i da'i tshor ba rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ji skad du bshad pa'i da'i tshor ba rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro //
translated: I will be free from the feelings described above.

original: des rus pa la ldag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rab tu rig par byed do //
analyzed: des rus pa la ldag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rab tu rig par byed do //
translated: In this way, examining the bone-biter worm, he develops a correct understanding of the body.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab bam /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab bam /
translated: Moreover, the spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: sees through wisdom derived from hearing or through the divine eye

original: shin tu 'drud byed ces bya ba'i srin rus pa rnams thams cad la gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: shin tu 'drud byed ces bya ba'i srin rus pa rnams thams cad la gnas pa yin no //
translated: that the bone-puller worm lives in all the bones.

original: des gal te shin tu rus pa drud par byed na ni /
analyzed: des gal te shin tu rus pa drud par byed na ni /
translated: If it pulls on the bones too much,

original: des bdag gi khams rnams thams cad skam po trog trog tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des bdag gi khams rnams thams cad skam po trog trog tu 'gyur ro //
translated: all my bodily constituents will dry out.

original: tshang pa dang skad 'gag pa dang bshang ba 'khru bar byed do //
analyzed: tshang pa dang skad 'gag pa dang bshang ba 'khru bar byed do //
translated: I will develop a cough, hoarseness, and diarrhea.

original: de rnams bdag la med na rtsib logs kyi nad dang skyug pa dang yi ga mi bde bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams bdag la med na rtsib logs kyi nad dang skyug pa dang yi ga mi bde bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If it does not do that, I will develop pain in the ribs, vomiting, and indigestion.

original: gal te rus pa'i tshigs su gyur pa rnams thams cad kyi yang rus pa rnams mi 'drud na ni /
analyzed: gal te rus pa'i tshigs su gyur pa rnams thams cad kyi yang rus pa rnams mi 'drud na ni /
translated: If the worm does not pull on all the bones at the joints,

original: ji skad du bshad par gyur pa'i nad rnams nga la 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad par gyur pa'i nad rnams nga la 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: I will not develop the illnesses that were just described.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag @202a *//
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag @202a *//
translated: Furthermore, the Yogācāra🔽

original: nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: “When the spiritual practitioner observes the internal body, he will notice that the joints are moved by a worm.

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur ba /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur ba /
translated: He will notice this with insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye.

original: tshigs pa gcod cing rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i srin lus la gnas pa yin no //🔽des rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed pa yin pa'ang des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: tshigs pa gcod cing rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i srin lus la gnas pa yin no // des rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed pa yin pa'ang des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: The worm that moves the joints is present in the body.

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa ni /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa ni /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice whether the worm is in a normal or abnormal condition.

original: tshigs gcod cing rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i srin ni /
analyzed: tshigs gcod cing rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i srin ni /
translated: He will notice that the worm that moves the joints

original: gal te yang zas kyi skyon gyis ltogs par gyur na bdag gi lag pa 'khrum par byed do; ;lus kyi yan lag rnams 'brul bar gyur pa'am snying gi nang du gyur pa'am grong khyer gnas pa rnams kyang stong bar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te yang zas kyi skyon gyis ltogs par gyur na bdag gi lag pa 'khrum par byed do; ;lus kyi yan lag rnams 'brul bar gyur pa'am snying gi nang du gyur pa'am grong khyer gnas pa rnams kyang stong bar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: is in a normal condition when it is not hungry, but when it is hungry due to a problem with the food, it will cause my hands to tremble, my limbs to shake, or my heart to pound, and I will see the city as empty.

original: snabs kyang 'khrug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snabs kyang 'khrug par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the mucus will be disturbed.

original: rtag tu yang yi mug pa dang reg bya dang gzugs rnams la blo kun tu dga' bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtag tu yang yi mug pa dang reg bya dang gzugs rnams la blo kun tu dga' bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One will always be depressed and will not enjoy tactile objects and forms.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: tshor ba rab tu stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshor ba rab tu stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the sensations are very powerful.

original: de tshigs pa gcod byed kyi srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rab tu rig par byed do //
analyzed: de tshigs pa gcod byed kyi srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rab tu rig par byed do //
translated: By examining the bone-destroyer worm, the yogī or yoginī will correctly understand the body.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: Moreover, when the yogī or yoginī who practices in this way carefully observes the internal body,

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: he or she will apply insight derived from hearing or see with the divine eye

original: dri ngan pa zhes bya ba'i srin lus la @202b gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: dri ngan pa zhes bya ba'i srin lus la @202b gnas pa yin te /
translated: that there is a worm called bad smell that lives in the body.

original: des rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci zhig byed pa yin na /
analyzed: des rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci zhig byed pa yin na /
translated: What does it do to harm or benefit the body when it is healthy or unhealthy?

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: With insight derived from hearing🔽or seeing with the divine eye,

original: lha'i mig gis mthong ba las dri ngan pa zhes bya ba'i srin gal te yang zas kyi skyon gyis khro ba skyes par gyur na /🔽des bdag la rnam par sreg pa dang lci ba dang lus rmar gyur pa myur du sos pa rnams kyang ring zhig 'gor ba dang sha bkra yang bdag gi lus kyi dkyil 'khor la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong ba las dri ngan pa zhes bya ba'i srin gal te yang zas kyi skyon gyis khro ba skyes par gyur na / des bdag la rnam par sreg pa dang lci ba dang lus rmar gyur pa myur du sos pa rnams kyang ring zhig 'gor ba dang sha bkra yang bdag gi lus kyi dkyil 'khor la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: “If the foul-smelling worm becomes angry due to the faults of food,🔽it will cause my body to burn, become heavy, and fester. Even if I quickly recover, it will take a long time. My body will become covered with white spots.

original: skya bor gyur pa yang lus la rgya chen por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skya bor gyur pa yang lus la rgya chen por 'gyur ro //
translated: My body will become pale.

original: thams cad du ma byung bar gyur na nyal ba ji lta ba bzhin du lus 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad du ma byung bar gyur na nyal ba ji lta ba bzhin du lus 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is not everywhere, my body will become like a sleeping corpse.

original: mdze yang bdag la 'byung ngo //
analyzed: mdze yang bdag la 'byung ngo //
translated: I will develop leprosy.

original: rnag gi dngos por gyur pa bdag gi lus rnams thams cad la rgyas par 'gyur //
analyzed: rnag gi dngos por gyur pa bdag gi lus rnams thams cad la rgyas par 'gyur //
translated: My entire body will become full of pus.

original: de'i nad de dag rnams rab tu zhi bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i nad de dag rnams rab tu zhi bar mi 'gyur /
translated: Those diseases will not be cured.

original: des dri ngan pa'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang lus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rig par byed do //🔽gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /🔽de thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /🔽lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: des dri ngan pa'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang lus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rig par byed do // gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na / de thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam / lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: In this way, by observing the foul-smelling worm, he develops a correct understanding of the body.

original: rus pa'i rnag gi rigs kyi srin rnams bdag gi lus la gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: rus pa'i rnag gi rigs kyi srin rnams bdag gi lus la gnas pa yin te /
translated: “The spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body will, with insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, also observe, ‘The bone-pus worm lives in my body.

original: des bdag la rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed pa yin na /
analyzed: des bdag la rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed pa yin na /
translated: What does it do, whether I am healthy or unhealthy?’

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab dag gis sam lha'i mig gis mthong ba ni /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab dag gis sam lha'i mig gis mthong ba ni /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice,

original: bdag gi srin rus @203a *//
analyzed: bdag gi srin rus @203a *//
translated: ‘The bone-pus worm lives in my bones.

original: pa'i rnag gi rigs rnams gal te zas kyi skyon gyis khros pa skyes par gyur na /
analyzed: pa'i rnag gi rigs rnams gal te zas kyi skyon gyis khros pa skyes par gyur na /
translated: If I eat the wrong food, it will become angry.

original: de gal te lo'am lo gnyis sam lo mang po na'ang rung /
analyzed: de gal te lo'am lo gnyis sam lo mang po na'ang rung /
translated: It may take a year, two years, or many years,

original: bdag byis par gyur pa tsam na'ang rung ste /
analyzed: bdag byis par gyur pa tsam na'ang rung ste /
translated: “Even when I was just a child,

original: lus la gal te brgyab cing bsnun pa rab tu zhi zhing sngon sos par gyur pa las de dag bdag gis srin de khros nas slar yang rnying pa la rgyu bar byed de /
analyzed: lus la gal te brgyab cing bsnun pa rab tu zhi zhing sngon sos par gyur pa las de dag bdag gis srin de khros nas slar yang rnying pa la rgyu bar byed de /
translated: if I was struck or hurt, the wound would heal and be restored to its former state. But then the worm would become angry and move to a new location.

original: ji srid du rgas par gyur gyi bar du yang khros pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid du rgas par gyur gyi bar du yang khros pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: As long as I was young, the worm would become angry.

original: rus pa'i rnag gi rigs kyi srin 'di ni /
analyzed: rus pa'i rnag gi rigs kyi srin 'di ni /
translated: This worm of the pus of the bones

original: shing pa laksho dang dum pa ra'i 'bras bu dang 'dra ba'i thig le dri mi zhim pa skyed par byed do //
analyzed: shing pa laksho dang dum pa ra'i 'bras bu dang 'dra ba'i thig le dri mi zhim pa skyed par byed do //
translated: produces pustules that smell foul, like the fruit of the palāśa and dūmvara trees.

original: de yang g-yan pa mang bar 'gyur zhing mang du 'dzag pa rnams kyang skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang g-yan pa mang bar 'gyur zhing mang du 'dzag pa rnams kyang skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The pustules become very itchy and ooze a lot.

original: smin ma 'dra ba yang skye bar 'gyur zhing tshang sbrang dang sha sbrang rnams kyang 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: smin ma 'dra ba yang skye bar 'gyur zhing tshang sbrang dang sha sbrang rnams kyang 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: They look like eyebrows and attract bees and flies.

original: des rus pa'i rnag gi rigs kyi srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang lus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rab tu rig par byed do //
analyzed: des rus pa'i rnag gi rigs kyi srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang lus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rab tu rig par byed do //
translated: In this way, examining the pus-bone worm, he develops a correct understanding of the body.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /
translated: “The spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body will also ask himself, ‘Are there any other worms in my body that cause disease and pain, and that are born from my own actions?’

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur ba /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur ba /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice,

original: kha dmar ba zhes bya ba'i srin rus pa la gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: kha dmar ba zhes bya ba'i srin rus pa la gnas pa yin te /
translated: ‘The red-mouth worm lives in my bones.

original: des bdag la rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed pa yin na /🔽de thos pa las byung ba'i @203b shes rab dag gis sam /
analyzed: des bdag la rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci byed pa yin na / de thos pa las byung ba'i @203b shes rab dag gis sam /
translated: What does it do when it is in a normal or abnormal condition?’🔽With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye,

original: lha'i mig gis mthong ba ni /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong ba ni /
translated: he will then notice,

original: bdag gi kha dmar ba zhes bya ba'i srin gang gi tshe zas dag gi skyon gyis ltogs par gyur pa na /
analyzed: bdag gi kha dmar ba zhes bya ba'i srin gang gi tshe zas dag gi skyon gyis ltogs par gyur pa na /
translated: ‘When the red-mouth worm is afflicted by food,

original: des bdag la me dpal 'dra ba'i nang chen po me dang mnyam par 'gyur ba khrag gi mthar thug par 'byung ba chu ser dang rnag mang po gyur nas nyin mo dang mtshan mo med par yang rab tu nye bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des bdag la me dpal 'dra ba'i nang chen po me dang mnyam par 'gyur ba khrag gi mthar thug par 'byung ba chu ser dang rnag mang po gyur nas nyin mo dang mtshan mo med par yang rab tu nye bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it becomes crazed, then day and night without a break, a great fire-like heat arises in my body, equal to fire, and my blood becomes like pus and serum.

original: khong rma zhes bya ba'i nad rab tu byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khong rma zhes bya ba'i nad rab tu byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: This is the illness called ‘internal wound.’

original: kha dmar ba'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus la so sor rig par byed do //
analyzed: kha dmar ba'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus la so sor rig par byed do //
translated: ” In this way, examining the red-mouth worm, he develops a correct understanding of the body.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas par byed na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab dag gis sam /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas par byed na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab dag gis sam /
translated: “Again, the spiritual practitioner who carefully observes the internal body sees that

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: with the wisdom that arises from hearing or through the divine eye,

original: myang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i srin bdag gi rus pa la spyod pa yin te /
analyzed: myang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i srin bdag gi rus pa la spyod pa yin te /

original: des nga la rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci zhig byed pa yin na /
analyzed: des nga la rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci zhig byed pa yin na /
translated: If it is asked what it does when it is in balance or out of balance,

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong ba ni /🔽mya ngan bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i srin zas dag gi skyon gyis gal te ltogs par gyur na /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong ba ni / mya ngan bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i srin zas dag gi skyon gyis gal te ltogs par gyur na /
translated: with the wisdom that arises from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye,🔽one sees that the worm called sorrow maker causes

original: des ngal 'brum bu rnams su byed do //🔽lus thams cad kyi yan lag dang nying lag rnams la kun tu rgyu bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: des ngal 'brum bu rnams su byed do // lus thams cad kyi yan lag dang nying lag rnams la kun tu rgyu bar byed pa yin te /
translated: pain in the stomach.🔽It moves through all the major and minor body parts

original: de lus gang dag nyid kho na la kun tu rgyu bar byed pa de dag nyid kho nar bdag rengs par 'gyur ro //🔽snying stong ba dang lus la tshor ba @204a *//
analyzed: de lus gang dag nyid kho na la kun tu rgyu bar byed pa de dag nyid kho nar bdag rengs par 'gyur ro // snying stong ba dang lus la tshor ba @204a *//
translated: and causes paralysis in the body parts through which it moves.

original: med par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: med par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: The heart becomes empty and the body becomes devoid of sensation.

original: sdang ba dang bshang ba 'gag par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdang ba dang bshang ba 'gag par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: One becomes angry and the feces become blocked.

original: gnyid med par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnyid med par yang 'gyur ro //

original: grog ma dang 'dra bar yan lag dang nyid lag rnams la rgyug par yang byed do //
analyzed: grog ma dang 'dra bar yan lag dang nyid lag rnams la rgyug par yang byed do //
translated: One runs through the major and minor body parts like an ant.

original: bdag shin tu skom par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag shin tu skom par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: I will become very thirsty.🔽I will become cold, and my body will swell.

original: bdag la mun pa kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang grang ba'i tshad pa dang skrangs par yang 'gyur ro; ;gal te yang myang bar byed pa'i srin ltogs par ma gyur na ni /
analyzed: bdag la mun pa kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang grang ba'i tshad pa dang skrangs par yang 'gyur ro; ;gal te yang myang bar byed pa'i srin ltogs par ma gyur na ni /
translated: If the tasting worm is not hungry,

analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i nad de dag rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro // gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa na nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas par byed pa na /
translated: then the aforementioned illnesses will be pacified.

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab dag gis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab dag gis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: “Moreover, the spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body, sees with insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye:

analyzed: pags pa za ba zhes bya ba'i srin lus la gnas pa yin te /
translated: ‘The skin-eater worm lives in my body.

original: des rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci zhig byed pa yin pa yang des thos pa'am  byung ba'i shes rab bam lha'i mig gis mthong ba ni /
analyzed: des rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci zhig byed pa yin pa yang des thos pa'am  byung ba'i shes rab bam lha'i mig gis mthong ba ni /
translated: If it is in its normal state or not, what will it do to me?’ With insight derived from hearing or seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice:

original: pags pa za ba zhes bya ba rus pa la gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: pags pa za ba zhes bya ba rus pa la gnas pa yin te /
translated: The skin eater lives in the bones.

original: de gal te ltogs par gyur na ni /
analyzed: de gal te ltogs par gyur na ni /
translated: If it becomes hungry,

original: des nga'i mchu skrangs par byed pa'am kha skrangs par byed pa'am mig skrangs par byed pa'am rnag gi thor ba'am rgyus pa 'khum par gyur pa'i tshor ba dang skom dad che ba dang mgrin pa skam pa dang rna ba skrangs pa dang / mjing ba rengs pa'am @204b thod pa rko rlog tu gyur pa'am dus ma yin par skra dkar po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am gre ba 'joms pa'am dus ma yin par gnyid dang mi mthun pa'i zas rnams la dga' ba'am gnas gcig la mi dga' bar 'gyur ba dang
analyzed: des nga'i mchu skrangs par byed pa'am kha skrangs par byed pa'am mig skrangs par byed pa'am rnag gi thor ba'am rgyus pa 'khum par gyur pa'i tshor ba dang skom dad che ba dang mgrin pa skam pa dang rna ba skrangs pa dang / mjing ba rengs pa'am @204b thod pa rko rlog tu gyur pa'am dus ma yin par skra dkar po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am gre ba 'joms pa'am dus ma yin par gnyid dang mi mthun pa'i zas rnams la dga' ba'am gnas gcig la mi dga' bar 'gyur ba dang
translated: it causes my lips to swell, my mouth to swell, my eyes to swell, or causes pus, boils, or the contraction of ligaments. It causes great thirst, a dry throat, swollen ears, a stiff neck, a headache, or premature gray hair. It destroys the throat or causes untimely sleep and a fondness for incompatible food or a dislike for one place.

original: / gnas dang kun dga' ra ba stong pa rnams la dga' ba'am sems rnam par g-yengs par gyur pa'am gang cung zad kyis mang du smra bar byed pa'am rtag par rgyun du yan lag dang nying lag rnams la sen mos 'phrug pas kyang bdag gi lus thal mtshub dang
analyzed: / gnas dang kun dga' ra ba stong pa rnams la dga' ba'am sems rnam par g-yengs par gyur pa'am gang cung zad kyis mang du smra bar byed pa'am rtag par rgyun du yan lag dang nying lag rnams la sen mos 'phrug pas kyang bdag gi lus thal mtshub dang
translated: or in empty houses or parks, or if one is distracted, or if one talks a lot, or if one constantly scratches one’s limbs and fingers,🔽

original: 'dra bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dra bar 'gyur te /
translated: He will be fond of empty houses and parks, or his mind will be distracted. He will talk a lot about anything, and he will constantly scratch his limbs and fingers, causing his body to become covered in sores.

original: pags pa za bar byed pa'i srin rnams kyi skyon gyis yin no //
analyzed: pags pa za bar byed pa'i srin rnams kyi skyon gyis yin no //
translated: This is due to the fault of the skin-eating worm.

original: de gal te ltogs par ma gyur na ni /
analyzed: de gal te ltogs par ma gyur na ni /
translated: If he is not hungry,

original: de'i tshe ji skad du bshad pa'i nang rnams 'phrug par mi 'gyur ro //🔽gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas par byed pa na des thos pa las byung ba'i shas rab bam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa ni /
analyzed: de'i tshe ji skad du bshad pa'i nang rnams 'phrug par mi 'gyur ro // gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas par byed pa na des thos pa las byung ba'i shas rab bam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa ni /
translated: he will not scratch as described.

original: grog ma pa zhes bya ba'i srin bdag gi rus pa'i gseb na rgyu ba yin te /
analyzed: grog ma pa zhes bya ba'i srin bdag gi rus pa'i gseb na rgyu ba yin te /
translated: “The spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body will, with insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, also observe, ‘The ant-like worm lives in my bones.

original: yang gal te bdag nyid ltogs par gyur na'ang rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci zhig byed pa yin na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: yang gal te bdag nyid ltogs par gyur na'ang rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci zhig byed pa yin na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: If he is hungry, what can he do, whether he is in his normal state or not?

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa ni /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa ni /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye,🔽he will notice that the worm called antra,

original: grog ma pa zhes bya ba'i bdag gi srin yang gal te zas kyi skyon gyis khros par gyur na /
analyzed: grog ma pa zhes bya ba'i bdag gi srin yang gal te zas kyi skyon gyis khros par gyur na /
translated: if it is angered by a fault in his food,🔽will cause pain in his vital organs,

original: de'i nga'i gnad rnams la sprul bzhin du @205a *//
analyzed: de'i nga'i gnad rnams la sprul bzhin du @205a *//
translated: as if they were being pierced by needles.

original: kun tu skrag par byed pa'i yid kyis tshor ba 'byung bar byed do //🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: kun tu skrag par byed pa'i yid kyis tshor ba 'byung bar byed do // 'di lta ste /
translated: It will cause him to feel

analyzed: spyi bo dang 'gram pa dgra dang snying dang rgyu zhabs dang gzhang dang lag pa dang rkang pa'i mthil dang sren mo'i gseb rnams su song nas khab bo zhin du gtung bar byed do // rgyun rnams kyang sgul bar byed do //
translated: pain in his head, in his cheeks, in his heart, in his intestines, in his anus, in his hands, in the soles of his feet, and in his testicles.🔽It will cause his channels to tremble.

original: sna la snabs rnams chud za bar byed do //
analyzed: sna la snabs rnams chud za bar byed do //
translated: It will cause his nose to run.

original: mig dang kha dang lus rnams kyang sgul bar yang byed do //
analyzed: mig dang kha dang lus rnams kyang sgul bar yang byed do //
translated: It also causes the eyes, mouth, and body to shake.

original: bdag zas rnams la zhe sdang bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag zas rnams la zhe sdang bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: I hate food.

original: de yang ltogs par gyur na srin du gyur pa'i srin gzhan gseb na rgyu ba rnams la rtsis med par lus la mtho 'tsham par byed pas nyin mtshan kun tu gnas so //
analyzed: de yang ltogs par gyur na srin du gyur pa'i srin gzhan gseb na rgyu ba rnams la rtsis med par lus la mtho 'tsham par byed pas nyin mtshan kun tu gnas so //
translated: When hungry, it is always present, day and night, and without regard for the other worms, it harms the body.

original: de'i tshor bas bdag zil gyis mnan pas gnyid 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshor bas bdag zil gyis mnan pas gnyid 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of its pain, I am overcome and cannot sleep.

original: gal te de ltogs par ma gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te de ltogs par ma gyur na ni /
translated: If I am not hungry,

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i nad de dag rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i nad de dag rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the illnesses described above will not occur.

original: grog ma pa'i srin la so sor brtags pas gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do //
analyzed: grog ma pa'i srin la so sor brtags pas gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do //
translated: In this way, examining the ant-like worm, he develops a correct understanding of the body.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /
translated: Moreover, the spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body will ask himself, “Are there any other worms in my body that cause disease and pain and that are difficult to control?”

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice, “The worm that lives in the flesh is found throughout my body.

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa spu gri'i kha zhes bya ba'i srin lus la rab tu gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa spu gri'i kha zhes bya ba'i srin lus la rab tu gnas pa yin te /
translated: The worm called razor mouth lives in the body.

original: des rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci zhig @205b byed pa yin na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: des rang bzhin du gnas pa'am rang bzhin du mi gnas pa ci zhig @205b byed pa yin na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /

original: lha'i mig gis mthong ba ni /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong ba ni /
translated: With wisdom derived from hearing or through the divine eye, he sees:

original: nga'i srin spu gri'i kha ni /
analyzed: nga'i srin spu gri'i kha ni /
translated: The worm razor mouth

original: skye gnas kyi sgo nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dang po nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: skye gnas kyi sgo nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dang po nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: is the first to appear at the time of birth.

original: chos nyid kyi khyad par gyis de dang lhan cig tu skye bas skyes pa yin no //
analyzed: chos nyid kyi khyad par gyis de dang lhan cig tu skye bas skyes pa yin no //
translated: Because of the specific nature of the worm, it is born together with the child.

original: mngal gyi nang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i srin rnams ni /
analyzed: mngal gyi nang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i srin rnams ni /
translated: All the worms that appear in the womb

original: thams cad nyid tshe'i 'du byed 'gog pa yin la ma'i nu ma dang zas kyi khyad par las bdag skyes par gyur nas ji skad du bshad pa'i srin rnams 'byung ngo //
analyzed: thams cad nyid tshe'i 'du byed 'gog pa yin la ma'i nu ma dang zas kyi khyad par las bdag skyes par gyur nas ji skad du bshad pa'i srin rnams 'byung ngo //
translated: cease their life-force. When the child is born from the mother’s womb and nourished by her milk and special foods, the worms mentioned above appear.

original: des spu gri'i kha'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang lus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so //
analyzed: des spu gri'i kha'i srin la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang lus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes so //
translated: By examining the worms on the edge of the razor, one understands the body as it is in reality.

original: rus pa'i gseb na rgyu ba'i srin gyis rigs rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags nas des rus par gyur pa'i lus la dran pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus mthong ste /
analyzed: rus pa'i gseb na rgyu ba'i srin gyis rigs rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags nas des rus par gyur pa'i lus la dran pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus mthong ste /
translated: Having examined the worms that move in the bones as they are in reality, one sees the body as it is in reality with mindfulness of the body that is made of bones.

original: rab rib med pa'i mig so so skye bo las shin tu 'das par gyur pa nyon mongs pa med pa nga'i ba med pa som nyi med pa mya ngan med pa rnam par dag par gyur pa /
analyzed: rab rib med pa'i mig so so skye bo las shin tu 'das par gyur pa nyon mongs pa med pa nga'i ba med pa som nyi med pa mya ngan med pa rnam par dag par gyur pa /
translated: With eyes free of cataracts, having transcended the ordinary person, being without afflictions, without pride, without doubt, without sorrow, being pure,

original: gzhan mu stegs can rnams kyi lta ba'i lam nas ma yin pas lus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khyad par du shes par gyur pa rnams ni /
analyzed: gzhan mu stegs can rnams kyi lta ba'i lam nas ma yin pas lus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khyad par du shes par gyur pa rnams ni /
translated: not following the path of the views of other tīrthikas, understanding the body as it is in reality,

original: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar 'gyur ro //
translated: they will reach the end of nirvāṇa.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas par byed pa na /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas par byed pa na /
translated: Furthermore, when yogis and yoginis carefully observe the internal body,

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /

analyzed: bdag gi gsus @208b pa 'byad par byed pa'am rlung gi gsus par 'gyur ba'am mkhris pa'i gsus par 'gyur ba'am bad kan gyi gsus par 'gyur bar skyed par byed do //

analyzed: gang dag bdag mid par byed pa'i ro de dang de dag rnams mnyam du mid par gyur nas rnam par rengs par byed de /

original: chos nyid kyi khyad par gyis yin no //
analyzed: chos nyid kyi khyad par gyis yin no //

translated: Due to the fault of that person who eats food together with worms, I become paralyzed,

analyzed: pa kun tu skyed pa dang / rgyu ma rnams kun tu 'khum pa'am na tsha bar 'gyur ba'am snying gi gzer zug gam pho tsha'i gzer zug kyang byed do //

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas par byed pa na /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas par byed pa na /

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab bam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa; mdog bzang zhes bya ba'i srin bdag gi lus la gnas pa yin te /

analyzed: nas thug gam mi bsod pa rnams sam lci ba'i zas bdag la phan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang rung ste gang dag bdag gis za bar byed pa de dag rnams bdag gi srin mdog bzang gis yan lag dang nying lag rnams kyi khams la'ang phan pa'i zas
translated: “If I eat barley flour, or if I eat unwholesome or heavy foods that are not beneficial to me, the good-color worm will distribute those foods that are beneficial to the elements of my major and minor body parts.

analyzed: de gal te ltogs par gyur na des nga'i lha ba bzhu bar byed do; ;des bdag gi rus pa 'byed pa dang mdog ngan pa dang sgal ba 'byung ba dang spungs chung ba dang nye sar bgrod pa dang sgur nas 'gro ba dang rnam par nyams par 'gyur
translated: It will cause my bones to break, my complexion to become bad, my back to become hunched, my body to become thin, my gait to become unsteady, and my body to become bent over.
