analyzed: rtsib logs na bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i bdag gi rlung de gal te 'khrugs par gyur na /
translated: He then notices, ‘The side-separator wind is present in my body. If it is disturbed,

original: des bdag gi logs kyi rus pa la gnas nas logs kyi gseb tu rgyu bar byed pa logs kyi khrag rnams rab tu skam par byed pas bdag la 'jigs su rung ba dang / rtsub pa dang / mi bzad cing drag por gyur pa'i tshor ba rnams skyed par byed do //
analyzed: des bdag gi logs kyi rus pa la gnas nas logs kyi gseb tu rgyu bar byed pa logs kyi khrag rnams rab tu skam par byed pas bdag la 'jigs su rung ba dang / rtsub pa dang / mi bzad cing drag por gyur pa'i tshor ba rnams skyed par byed do //
translated: it will cause my bones to separate and move about in the spaces between my ribs. It will dry up the blood in my ribs and cause terrible, rough, unbearable, and severe pain.

original: gal te rlung de bdag la 'khrugs par ma gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te rlung de bdag la 'khrugs par ma gyur na ni /
translated: If that wind is not disturbed,

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i nad @222b de dag rnams rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i nad @222b de dag rnams rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: none of those illnesses will occur.

original: des logs na bar byed pa'i rlung rig par gyur nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rig par byed do //
analyzed: des logs na bar byed pa'i rlung rig par gyur nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rig par byed do //
translated: ’ In this way, examining the side-separator wind, he has knowledge of it and accurately discerns it.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na /
translated: “The spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body will further wonder, ‘What other winds are present in my body? What functions do they perform?

original: bdag gi rlung gzhan gang dag gis 'khrugs par gyur pa dang / 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: bdag gi rlung gzhan gang dag gis 'khrugs par gyur pa dang / 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: What functions does it perform when it is either disturbed or in balance?🔽With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye,

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: he will notice,

original: bu ga dgu'i nad ces bya ba'i rlung bdag gi lus la rab tu gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: bu ga dgu'i nad ces bya ba'i rlung bdag gi lus la rab tu gnas pa yin te /
translated: ‘The nine-hole disease is present in my body.

original: des bdag la 'khrugs pa dang ma 'khrugs pa na las ci zhig byed par gyur pa yang des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /🔽lha'i mig gis mthong ba las bu ga dgu na bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i bdag gi rlung gal te 'khrugs par gyur na /
analyzed: des bdag la 'khrugs pa dang ma 'khrugs pa na las ci zhig byed par gyur pa yang des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam / lha'i mig gis mthong ba las bu ga dgu na bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i bdag gi rlung gal te 'khrugs par gyur na /
translated: What functions does it perform when it is either disturbed or in balance?’🔽With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will notice,

original: des bdag gi bu ga dgu po rnams ma lus par 'chum par byed do //
analyzed: des bdag gi bu ga dgu po rnams ma lus par 'chum par byed do //
translated: ‘If the nine-hole disease is disturbed, it will cause all my nine orifices to close up.

original: bu ga bdun mgo bo la gnas pa dang / gnyis bshang ba dang gci ba'i yin te /
analyzed: bu ga bdun mgo bo la gnas pa dang / gnyis bshang ba dang gci ba'i yin te /
translated: There are seven orifices in the head, two in the anus and urethra,🔽and one in the palms of the hands and the soles of the feet.

original: spyir yo'am gal te re re'ang rlung bkag par gyur na'ang des lus mnyam par na bar byed do //
analyzed: spyir yo'am gal te re re'ang rlung bkag par gyur na'ang des lus mnyam par na bar byed do //
translated: If the wind is blocked in general, or if each of them is blocked, the body becomes equally ill.

original: dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba yang 'dis shin tu sdom par byed do //
analyzed: dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba yang 'dis shin tu sdom par byed do //
translated: Inhaling and exhaling are also very much controlled by this.

original: sna bug na yod pa'i rlung gis ni /
analyzed: sna bug na yod pa'i rlung gis ni /
translated: The wind in the nostrils🔽holds the entire body well.

original: lus rnams thams cad legs par 'dzin par byed pa dang / bdag gi lus kyi gong bu 'di ni /
analyzed: lus rnams thams cad legs par 'dzin par byed pa dang / bdag gi lus kyi gong bu 'di ni /
translated: This body of mine

original: rlung gi dbang du gyur pa yin @223a *//
analyzed: rlung gi dbang du gyur pa yin @223a *//
translated: is under the power of wind.

original: zhing rlung yang 'khrul 'khor bzhin te /
analyzed: zhing rlung yang 'khrul 'khor bzhin te /
translated: The wind is like a machine.

original: rlung ni / rlung nyid kyis bskyod par byed kyi /
analyzed: rlung ni / rlung nyid kyis bskyod par byed kyi /
translated: The wind is moved by the wind itself.

original: gzhan dag 'ga' zhig kyang ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dag 'ga' zhig kyang ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not moved by anything else.

original: des bu ga dgu na par byed ba'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do //
analyzed: des bu ga dgu na par byed ba'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do //
translated: By examining the wind that causes the nine orifices, he knows the body as it truly is.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
translated: The spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body will further notice, ‘

original: bdag gi rlung gzhan gang dag gis las ci zhig byed pa yin na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: bdag gi rlung gzhan gang dag gis las ci zhig byed pa yin na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: What functions does the other vāyu perform in my body?

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa; yan lag dang nying lag thung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i bdag gi rlung yin na /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa; yan lag dang nying lag thung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i bdag gi rlung yin na /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice, ‘The short-limbs-and-joints vayu is in my body.

original: de 'khrugs par gyur pa dang / 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na bdag la las ci zhig byed pa yang des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: de 'khrugs par gyur pa dang / 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na bdag la las ci zhig byed pa yang des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: If it is disturbed, what will happen? If it is not disturbed, what will happen?’

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa ni /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa ni /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice,

original: gal te bdag gi yan lag dang nying lag rnams thung bar byed pa'i rlung 'khrugs par gyur na des sor mo rnams 'khum par byed do //
analyzed: gal te bdag gi yan lag dang nying lag rnams thung bar byed pa'i rlung 'khrugs par gyur na des sor mo rnams 'khum par byed do //
translated: ‘If the short-limbs-and-joints vayu is disturbed, it will cause my fingers to contract.

original: gnad rnams 'bigs par byed do //
analyzed: gnad rnams 'bigs par byed do //
translated: It will pierce my vital points.

original: dman zhing thung bar byed do //
analyzed: dman zhing thung bar byed do //
translated: It will make me short.

original: rkang pa dang lag pa'ang kun tu 'khum par byed do //
analyzed: rkang pa dang lag pa'ang kun tu 'khum par byed do //
translated: It will cause my hands and feet to contract.

original: steng gi rus pa rnams gzer zug byed do //
analyzed: steng gi rus pa rnams gzer zug byed do //
translated: It will cause pain in my upper bones.’

original: brla'i rgyus pa rnams 'khum par byed do //
analyzed: brla'i rgyus pa rnams 'khum par byed do //
translated: It causes the muscles of the thighs to contract.

original: 'on kyang rgyu ma la gnas pa rnams sbom por yang mi byed do //
analyzed: 'on kyang rgyu ma la gnas pa rnams sbom por yang mi byed do //
translated: However, it does not cause the intestines to become enlarged.

original: rkang pa dang lus rnams @223b ngal dub skyed par byed do //
analyzed: rkang pa dang lus rnams @223b ngal dub skyed par byed do //
translated: It causes fatigue in the legs and body.

original: nad 'di dag rnams ni /
analyzed: nad 'di dag rnams ni /
translated: These are the illnesses that arise

original: yan lag dang nying lag thung bar byed pa'i bdag gi rlung gis byed do //
analyzed: yan lag dang nying lag thung bar byed pa'i bdag gi rlung gis byed do //
translated: from the contraction of the short limbs and digits wind.

original: gal te 'khrugs par ma gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te 'khrugs par ma gyur na ni /
translated: If it is not disturbed,

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i nad de dag rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i nad de dag rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then these illnesses do not occur.

original: yan lag dang nying lag thung bar byed pa'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus la so sor rig par byed do //
analyzed: yan lag dang nying lag thung bar byed pa'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus la so sor rig par byed do //
translated: By examining the wind that causes the contraction of the short limbs and digits, discernment of the body is gained.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
translated: “The spiritual practitioner who carefully observes the internal body

original: bdag gi rlung gang dag gis las ci zhig byed pa yin na /
analyzed: bdag gi rlung gang dag gis las ci zhig byed pa yin na /
translated: thinks, ‘What functions do the winds perform in my body?’

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or through the divine eye, he will then notice,

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: He will then notice:

original: me drod kun tu sun 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i rlung bdag gi lus la rab tu gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: me drod kun tu sun 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i rlung bdag gi lus la rab tu gnas pa yin te /
translated: The wind that destroys digestive heat is present in my body.

original: des bdag la 'khrugs par gyur pa dang 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa'ang des mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: des bdag la 'khrugs par gyur pa dang 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa'ang des mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: When it is disturbed or not disturbed, what does it do?

original: gal te me drod sun 'byin par byed pa'i rlung lus la 'khrugs par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te me drod sun 'byin par byed pa'i rlung lus la 'khrugs par gyur na /
translated: If the wind that destroys digestive heat is disturbed in my body,

original: des bdag gi lus la gnas par gyur pa'i me drod rnams rang gi gnas nas 'pho bar byas nas nyams par byed do //
analyzed: des bdag gi lus la gnas par gyur pa'i me drod rnams rang gi gnas nas 'pho bar byas nas nyams par byed do //
translated: it will move the digestive heat in my body from its place and destroy it.

original: des bdag me drod nyams par gyur nas zas rnams smin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des bdag me drod nyams par gyur nas zas rnams smin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: When my digestive heat is destroyed, food will not be digested.

original: skom yang bdag gis 'ju bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skom yang bdag gis 'ju bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Even if I drink, it will not be digested.

original: des pags par gyur pa rnams kyang mdog ngan par 'gyur ro /
analyzed: des pags par gyur pa rnams kyang mdog ngan par 'gyur ro /
translated: It will also make my skin look bad.

original: khrag rnams kyang skam zhing sha dag @224a *//
analyzed: khrag rnams kyang skam zhing sha dag @224a *//
translated: It will dry up my blood and

original: kyang yongs su nyams par byed do //
analyzed: kyang yongs su nyams par byed do //
translated: cause my flesh to deteriorate.

original: rgyus pa rnams 'khum par 'gyur ba skyed par byed do //🔽tshil rnams med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyus pa rnams 'khum par 'gyur ba skyed par byed do // tshil rnams med par 'gyur ro //
translated: It causes the tendons to contract.🔽It causes the fat to disappear.

original: bdag gi rus pa rnams kyang skam par 'gyur ro //🔽lha ba kun kyang srab mor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gi rus pa rnams kyang skam par 'gyur ro // lha ba kun kyang srab mor 'gyur ro //
translated: It causes the bones to dry up.🔽It causes the marrow to diminish.

original: bdag gi lus thams cad las gyur pa'i khu chu dag dang stobs rnams kyang nyams par byed do //
analyzed: bdag gi lus thams cad las gyur pa'i khu chu dag dang stobs rnams kyang nyams par byed do //
translated: It causes the semen and strength of the entire body to diminish.

original: snying la brten pa'i rlung gis ni; rtogs par mi byed do //
analyzed: snying la brten pa'i rlung gis ni; rtogs par mi byed do //
translated: The wind that is located in the heart does not cause one to understand.

original: gal te yang me drod kun tu sun 'byin par byed pa'i rlung 'khrugs par ma gyur na /
analyzed: gal te yang me drod kun tu sun 'byin par byed pa'i rlung 'khrugs par ma gyur na /
translated: If the wind that disturbs the digestive heat is not disturbed,

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i nad de dag rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //🔽gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i nad de dag rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
translated: none of those aforementioned illnesses will occur.

original: bdag gi rlung gang dag gi las ci zhig byed pa yin na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: bdag gi rlung gang dag gi las ci zhig byed pa yin na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: “The spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body will also wonder, ‘What functions do the winds perform in my body?🔽With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye,

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: he will then notice,

original: bdag gi lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad grang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung yin te /🔽des 'khrugs par gyur pa'am 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin pa yang des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: bdag gi lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad grang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung yin te / des 'khrugs par gyur pa'am 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin pa yang des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: The wind that causes all the major and minor body parts to be cold.🔽When it is disturbed or not disturbed, what does it do?

original: lha'i mig gis mthong ba ni /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong ba ni /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he sees:

original: bdag gi lus thams cad grang mor byed pa'i rlung gal te 'khrugs par gyur na /
analyzed: bdag gi lus thams cad grang mor byed pa'i rlung gal te 'khrugs par gyur na /
translated: ‘If the wind that causes the whole body to be cold is disturbed,

original: lus la kha chu skyes pa dang rlan par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus la kha chu skyes pa dang rlan par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: my body will sweat and become moist.

original: 'di lta ste /🔽nyal bar gyur pa na rtsub pa dang gyong ba'i kha dog dang @224b 'khum par yang byed do //🔽snyoms par lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag rnams hrud hrud por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di lta ste / nyal bar gyur pa na rtsub pa dang gyong ba'i kha dog dang @224b 'khum par yang byed do // snyoms par lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag rnams hrud hrud por 'gyur ro //
translated: It will be like this:🔽When I lie down, it will be rough and hard, and my body will be twisted.🔽My body will be stiff and my major and minor body parts will be rigid.

original: bdag gi lus kyi ba spu rnams langs par yang lus 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gi lus kyi ba spu rnams langs par yang lus 'gyur ro //
translated: My body hair will stand on end.

original: lab leb mang zhing mi mnyam par gyur par lus kyi yul 'ga' zhig tu skyed par 'gyur ro //🔽'dzad par 'gyur ba skyed pa dang g-yan pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i chu ser khrag gi rgyal po yang skyed do //
analyzed: lab leb mang zhing mi mnyam par gyur par lus kyi yul 'ga' zhig tu skyed par 'gyur ro // 'dzad par 'gyur ba skyed pa dang g-yan pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i chu ser khrag gi rgyal po yang skyed do //
translated: It will cause the body to become uneven and bumpy.🔽It will cause the body to become covered in pus and blood.

original: spu rnams kyang ser por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spu rnams kyang ser por 'gyur ro //
translated: It will cause the body to become covered in hair.

original: tshad pas gdungs par 'gyur ro //🔽sbom pa nyid du gyur cing lus kyi yul rnams mi mnyam par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshad pas gdungs par 'gyur ro // sbom pa nyid du gyur cing lus kyi yul rnams mi mnyam par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: It will cause the body to become feverish.🔽It will cause the body to become uneven and bumpy.🔽It will cause the body to become pale.

original: skya bo nyid du yul de dag rnams 'gyur ro; ;bdag gi lus po la'ang pags pa 'thug po kab kob mang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skya bo nyid du yul de dag rnams 'gyur ro; ;bdag gi lus po la'ang pags pa 'thug po kab kob mang du 'gyur ro //
translated: It will cause the body to become covered in thick, rough skin.

original: glang po'i pags pa dang 'dra bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: glang po'i pags pa dang 'dra bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: It will cause the body to become like the skin of an elephant.🔽It will cause the body to become so heavy that one is unable to rise from one’s seat.

original: bdag gi dka' blas kyis bdag gis langs nus par 'gyur ro; ;rnag gi dri rnams kyang bdag gi lus las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gi dka' blas kyis bdag gis langs nus par 'gyur ro; ;rnag gi dri rnams kyang bdag gi lus las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It will cause the body to become covered in pus.

original: ji srid du zas kyang rtsub pa'i rdag rdog can du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji srid du zas kyang rtsub pa'i rdag rdog can du 'gyur ro //
translated: It will cause the food to become coarse and rough.

original: bdag gi lus kyi phyogs gcig nas glang po che'i pags pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gi lus kyi phyogs gcig nas glang po che'i pags pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One side of my body will become like an elephant’s hide.

original: 'brum 'jur dang snye ba yang bdag gi ngos gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'brum 'jur dang snye ba yang bdag gi ngos gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Boils and blisters will appear on one side of my body.

original: skyes bu lag pa dang rkang pa dag la rma'ang kun tu skye bar byed do //
analyzed: skyes bu lag pa dang rkang pa dag la rma'ang kun tu skye bar byed do //
translated: My hands and feet will be covered with sores.

original: bdag 'gro ba dang 'ong bar gyur pa na'ang ngal zhing dub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag 'gro ba dang 'ong bar gyur pa na'ang ngal zhing dub par 'gyur ro //
translated: When I go out or come in, I will be tired and exhausted.

original: g-yan pa'ang bdag gi lus kyi phyogs gcig tu kun nas skye bar byed do //
analyzed: g-yan pa'ang bdag gi lus kyi phyogs gcig tu kun nas skye bar byed do //
translated: Itch mites will appear all over one side of my body.

original: rnam par sreg par byed pa'ang rtag tu skyed do //
analyzed: rnam par sreg par byed pa'ang rtag tu skyed do //
translated: It will always be burning.

original: bdag @225a *// gi lus reg bya ngan par yang kun tu skye bar byed do //
analyzed: bdag @225a *// gi lus reg bya ngan par yang kun tu skye bar byed do //
translated: My body will be covered with unpleasant sensations.

original: rang gi thum po skyes pa rnams rnams par 'phel bar byed do //
analyzed: rang gi thum po skyes pa rnams rnams par 'phel bar byed do //
translated: My own abscesses will grow.

original: rnam par rmas par byed do //
analyzed: rnam par rmas par byed do //
translated: They will burst open.

original: so la'ang bdag chags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: so la'ang bdag chags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
translated: I will be separated from my attachment to my teeth.

original: bdag gi sna yang zug gzer chen por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gi sna yang zug gzer chen por 'gyur ro //
translated: My nose will be in great pain.

original: bdag gi mig gnyis kyi rdzi ma phra mo rnams 'brul bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gi mig gnyis kyi rdzi ma phra mo rnams 'brul bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The eyelashes on my eyes will fall out.

original: sor mo dang rkang pa'i sor mo rnams kyang rnam par 'brul bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sor mo dang rkang pa'i sor mo rnams kyang rnam par 'brul bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The fingers and toes on my hands and feet will fall off.

original: skad rnams kyang grag yar med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skad rnams kyang grag yar med par 'gyur ro //
translated: My voice will be hoarse.🔽Worms will appear on the outside of my body.

original: srin bu'ang phyi rol tu rgyu bar gyur par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;bdag gi yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad kyi spu rnams nyil bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srin bu'ang phyi rol tu rgyu bar gyur par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro; ;bdag gi yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad kyi spu rnams nyil bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The hair on my body and limbs will fall out.

original: skye bo rnams thams cad kyang bdag la skyug ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye bo rnams thams cad kyang bdag la skyug ldog par 'gyur ro //
translated: Everyone will vomit at the sight of me.

original: sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gi khyim du yang bdag smod par bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gi khyim du yang bdag smod par bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro //
translated: I will be despised in the homes of donors and benefactors.

original: sbrang bu rnams kyang bdag gi lus la rtag tu rgyug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbrang bu rnams kyang bdag gi lus la rtag tu rgyug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Flies will constantly swarm around my body.

original: chos gos kyang bdag gi lus la mi bzod do //
analyzed: chos gos kyang bdag gi lus la mi bzod do //
translated: My robes will not be comfortable on my body.

original: bdag gi sen mo rnams kyang rnam par nyil bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gi sen mo rnams kyang rnam par nyil bar 'gyur ro //
translated: My nails will fall off.

original: bdag nyal bar gyur pa na'ang ngar ngar po'i dbugs rnams kun tu 'byung ngo //
analyzed: bdag nyal bar gyur pa na'ang ngar ngar po'i dbugs rnams kun tu 'byung ngo //
translated: When I lie down, my breath becomes labored.

original: bdag sdug bsngal bar gyur pas kyang zas la sred par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag sdug bsngal bar gyur pas kyang zas la sred par 'gyur ro //
translated: When I am in pain, I crave food.

original: 'on kyang 'ju ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'ju ba ma yin no //
translated: But I cannot digest it.

original: bdag gis btung ba rnams 'thungs pas kyang khyad par du tshad pa skyed par byed do //
analyzed: bdag gis btung ba rnams 'thungs pas kyang khyad par du tshad pa skyed par byed do //
translated: When I drink, it increases my fever.

original: bdag gi lce yang rnam @225b par 'gyur ba skyed do //
analyzed: bdag gi lce yang rnam @225b par 'gyur ba skyed do //
translated: My tongue becomes altered.

original: de ltar yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad la grang bar byed pa'i rlung dag gis dman par gyur pas lus rnams 'dzag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad la grang bar byed pa'i rlung dag gis dman par gyur pas lus rnams 'dzag par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, the cold wind that moves through all my major and minor body parts causes my body to drip.

original: gal te yang bdag gis yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad la grang bar byed pa'i rlung rab tu rgyas par ma gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te yang bdag gis yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad la grang bar byed pa'i rlung rab tu rgyas par ma gyur na ni /
translated: If the cold wind that moves through all my major and minor body parts were to cease,

original: grang ba ma yin pa'i rlung des lus mdog bzang ba dang / mkhregs pa dang / 'jam zhing snum bag can dang / dkar ba dang / mnyen pa dang / skye bo rnams thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: grang ba ma yin pa'i rlung des lus mdog bzang ba dang / mkhregs pa dang / 'jam zhing snum bag can dang / dkar ba dang / mnyen pa dang / skye bo rnams thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The wind that is not cold makes the body’s complexion good, firm, smooth, and shiny, white, supple, and pleasing to all people.

original: rdul ba rnams thams cad na dro bar gyur pa la rigs pas yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad dang / ba spu'i khung bu rnams nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdul ba rnams thams cad na dro bar gyur pa la rigs pas yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad dang / ba spu'i khung bu rnams nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In all the pores of the body, heat arises through the power of the wind.

original: ji skad du bshad par gyur pa'i nad rnams kyang rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad par gyur pa'i nad rnams kyang rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The illnesses that were explained before do not occur.

original: des yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad la grang bar byed pa'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang lus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rig par byed do //
analyzed: des yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad la grang bar byed pa'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang lus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rig par byed do //
translated: In this way, examining the cold wind in all the major and minor body parts, he develops a correct understanding of the body.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
translated: “The Spiritual Practitioner who carefully observes the internal body continues to wonder, ‘Are there any other winds in the body?’

original: bdag gi rlung gzhan gang dag gis lus la las ci zhig byed pa yin na /
analyzed: bdag gi rlung gzhan gang dag gis lus la las ci zhig byed pa yin na /
translated: What other functions do the other bodily vāyus perform?

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: With insight derived from hearing

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: or by means of the divine eye, he will see

original: brtan pa 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung lus la 'khrugs par gyur na /🔽des bdag 'jigs pa chung du la'ang bdag gi snying dngags @226a *//
analyzed: brtan pa 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung lus la 'khrugs par gyur na / des bdag 'jigs pa chung du la'ang bdag gi snying dngags @226a *//
translated: that if the vāyu that destroys stability is disturbed in the body,

original: par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: par 'gyur ro //
translated: it will cause my heart to pound even at a small fright.

original: yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad la'ang lhang kyog 'byung ngo //
analyzed: yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad la'ang lhang kyog 'byung ngo //
translated: All my major and minor body parts will ache.

original: rengs par 'gyur ba dang / dngangs par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rengs par 'gyur ba dang / dngangs par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: I will be paralyzed and terrified.

original: rmongs par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rmongs par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: I will be confused.

original: bdag gi dbugs kyang stobs shin tu phul du phyin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gi dbugs kyang stobs shin tu phul du phyin par 'gyur ro //
translated: My breathing will be very labored.

original: 'on kyang dbugs kyang phyir rdub par yang mi nus par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang dbugs kyang phyir rdub par yang mi nus par 'gyur ro //
translated: I will be unable to inhale.

original: bdag gis chos gos kyang mi bzod do //
analyzed: bdag gis chos gos kyang mi bzod do //
translated: I will be unable to bear my Dharma robes.

original: bdag la mgo bo'i nad rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag la mgo bo'i nad rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: I will have headaches.

original: bsam gtan la gnas par gyur pa na'ang sems kyi dmigs pa gcig tu mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan la gnas par gyur pa na'ang sems kyi dmigs pa gcig tu mi 'gyur ro //
translated: When he is in samādhi, his mind does not become one-pointed.

original: bdag gis rmi lam du'ang rnam par 'gyur ba rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gis rmi lam du'ang rnam par 'gyur ba rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He sees changes even in his dreams.

original: bdag la skyug pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag la skyug pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He vomits.

original: bdag gis zhi bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs rnams kyang drag por gyur pa mthong ngo //
analyzed: bdag gis zhi bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs rnams kyang drag por gyur pa mthong ngo //
translated: He sees peaceful forms as violent.

original: thag nye bar gyur pa'i gzugs rnams kyang bdag gis rgyang ring bar mthong bar 'gyur ro //

translated: Those that move in the brain move from the brain to the meninges and then to the skull, where they enter the openings and eat the hair.🔽Those that move in the ears cause the nose to run, those that move in the fat cause the joints, cheeks, and forehead to ache, those that move in the teeth cause toothaches, and the ten types of worms that live in the throat and neck eat phlegm, vomit, and so on.

analyzed: pa'i srin de dag rnams la srin rnams la kun tu 'jug par byed pa'i rlung gis srin rnams thams cad lus kyi nang na rgyu bas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rlung gis 'bigs par byed pa yin te /
translated: The worms that enter the worms are moved around inside the body by the wind that enters the worms. The wind pierces them as it wishes.

original: bdag gi lus dang po dang srog srin rnams thams cad kyang ngo //
analyzed: bdag gi lus dang po dang srog srin rnams thams cad kyang ngo //
translated: My body and my life are all worms.

original: des srin bu rnams la kun tu 'jug par byed pa'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do //🔽gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
analyzed: des srin bu rnams la kun tu 'jug par byed pa'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do // gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
translated: As he examines the wind that enters the worms, the spiritual practitioner has a correct understanding of the body.🔽“The spiritual practitioner who carefully observes his body and attends to it through the external body will further wonder, ‘Are there any other winds in my body?🔽What functions do they perform?’

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice, ‘The wind that separates the body and mind exists in my body.

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: He sees with the divine eye:

original: steng 'og tu byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung bdag gi lus la rab tu gnas pa yin te /🔽des 'khrugs par gyur pa dang 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin pa yang des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: steng 'og tu byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung bdag gi lus la rab tu gnas pa yin te / des 'khrugs par gyur pa dang 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin pa yang des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: “There is a wind called upper and lower, which is present in my body.🔽What does it do when it is disturbed or not disturbed?

original: lha'i mig gis mthong ba ni /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong ba ni /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or through the divine eye, he sees:

original: steng dang 'og gi rlung gal te bdag la 'khrugs par gyur na /
analyzed: steng dang 'og gi rlung gal te bdag la 'khrugs par gyur na /
translated: “If the upper and lower winds are disturbed in me,

original: de rnam pa lngar lam lnga la rjes su rten par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnam pa lngar lam lnga la rjes su rten par 'gyur ro //
translated: they will disturb the five pathways and five locations.

original: gnas lnga la gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: gnas lnga la gnas pa yin no //
translated: They are present in five locations.

original: gnas lnga la gnas par gyur nas kyang las gang dag byed pa yin na /
analyzed: gnas lnga la gnas par gyur nas kyang las gang dag byed pa yin na /
translated: What actions do they perform when they are present in five locations?

original: dbugs 'byung ba dang rdub pa rnams kun tu rgyu bar byed do //
analyzed: dbugs 'byung ba dang rdub pa rnams kun tu rgyu bar byed do //
translated: They cause the exhalation and inhalation of breath to move.

original: de la 'jig rten 'di na srog ces brjod do //
analyzed: de la 'jig rten 'di na srog ces brjod do //
translated: In this world, they are called life.

original: de mgo bo dang brang la kun @229b tu brten nas de dag gi nang na rgyu bar byed pa lus thams cad la stobs dang ldan par 'phro bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de mgo bo dang brang la kun @229b tu brten nas de dag gi nang na rgyu bar byed pa lus thams cad la stobs dang ldan par 'phro bar byed pa yin no //
translated: It is located in the head and chest, and moves within them. It spreads throughout the body with great force.

original: de'ang gang gi tshe mi bzad par gyur pa na des lus kyi 'khrul 'khor rnam par 'jig par byed do //
analyzed: de'ang gang gi tshe mi bzad par gyur pa na des lus kyi 'khrul 'khor rnam par 'jig par byed do //
translated: When it becomes unbearable, it destroys the body’s mechanism.

original: de'i las ni /
analyzed: de'i las ni /
translated: Its function is

original: lung pa dang glo lu ba 'og tu song bar gyur nas zas kha'i lam nas steng du byed do //
analyzed: lung pa dang glo lu ba 'og tu song bar gyur nas zas kha'i lam nas steng du byed do //
translated: to cause hiccups and asthma, and to bring food from the throat to the stomach.

original: de'i las kyis dbugs 'byung ba dang rdub pa 'di dag gi cha gnyis pa brang snying la legs par brten nas shin tu dga' bar byed do //
analyzed: de'i las kyis dbugs 'byung ba dang rdub pa 'di dag gi cha gnyis pa brang snying la legs par brten nas shin tu dga' bar byed do //
translated: Its function is to cause the two parts of inhalation and exhalation to rest well in the chest and heart, and to bring great pleasure.

original: gang gi tshe yang steng du rgyu bar gyur na dga' ba dang bral bar yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe yang steng du rgyu bar gyur na dga' ba dang bral bar yang 'gyur te /
translated: When it moves upward, it causes the loss of pleasure.

original: de mgrin pa'i sbu gu'i gseb nas steng du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mgo bo rab tu brtol bar gyur nas lce'i rtsa bar 'gro'o //
analyzed: de mgrin pa'i sbu gu'i gseb nas steng du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mgo bo rab tu brtol bar gyur nas lce'i rtsa bar 'gro'o //
translated: It moves upward through the throat and comes out of the mouth. It splits the head and goes to the root of the tongue.

original: de lce la brten par gyur na ni /
analyzed: de lce la brten par gyur na ni /
translated: When it is located in the tongue,

original: de ma thag pa'i yid kyi lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen dang phrad pas yi ge'i brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rtogs pa dang spyod pa dang ldan pa rnams rjod par byed do //
analyzed: de ma thag pa'i yid kyi lhan cig byed pa'i rkyen dang phrad pas yi ge'i brjod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rtogs pa dang spyod pa dang ldan pa rnams rjod par byed do //
translated: it is the condition for the simultaneous arising of the mind that immediately follows it. It causes the various kinds of verbal expression to be understood and used.

original: cha gsum pas kyang rtag par rgyun du lus kyi me drod 'phel bar byed do //
analyzed: cha gsum pas kyang rtag par rgyun du lus kyi me drod 'phel bar byed do //
translated: The third part of the life-force wind always and continuously increases the heat of the body’s fire.

original: skyon yang des 'dug par byed do //
analyzed: skyon yang des 'dug par byed do //
translated: It also causes the faults to be located there.

original: bzhi pas ni /
analyzed: bzhi pas ni /
translated: The fourth part

original: rang gi lus la khyab par gyur nas nges par gnas so //
analyzed: rang gi lus la khyab par gyur nas nges par gnas so //
translated: pervades one’s body and is located there.

original: rtag tu mig 'dzum pa dang 'byed par byed pa po de la brten nas rked pa dang / rgyu zhags dang / brla dang / rlig pa dang rnams la rten cing bshang ba'i lam la rten par byed do //🔽des kyang lto rgyas par byed de bud med rnams ni /
analyzed: rtag tu mig 'dzum pa dang 'byed par byed pa po de la brten nas rked pa dang / rgyu zhags dang / brla dang / rlig pa dang rnams la rten cing bshang ba'i lam la rten par byed do // des kyang lto rgyas par byed de bud med rnams ni /
translated: It is the basis for the opening and closing of the eyes. It is located in the waist, the genitals, the thighs, and the testicles. It is also located in the anus.🔽It also causes the belly to be full.

original: 'grib par byed do //
analyzed: 'grib par byed do //
translated: It causes women to menstruate.

original: aan tod rus pa la brten @230a *//
analyzed: aan tod rus pa la brten @230a *//
translated: The part located in the bones is called the “bone-life-force wind.”

original: nas gang gi tshe bud med dag khu chu dang khrag rnams kun tu sbyor bar gyur pa na /
analyzed: nas gang gi tshe bud med dag khu chu dang khrag rnams kun tu sbyor bar gyur pa na /
translated: When the woman’s semen and blood come together,

original: bud med kyi rgyu zhabs kyi gnas su shugs dang ldan par kun tu rgyug par gyur nas des khu chu dang khrag kun tu 'dre bar byed do //
analyzed: bud med kyi rgyu zhabs kyi gnas su shugs dang ldan par kun tu rgyug par gyur nas des khu chu dang khrag kun tu 'dre bar byed do //
translated: the wind moves powerfully in the lower part of the woman’s body and mixes the semen and blood.

original: sla mo rnams ni /
analyzed: sla mo rnams ni /
translated: The easy-flowing

original: yang bar byed do //
analyzed: yang bar byed do //
translated: makes them thin.

original: gang gi tshe zas rnam par 'ju bar byed pa na cha gsum pa 'dod pa'i ma'i bya bas gsal bar byas nas rnam par 'byed par byed do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe zas rnam par 'ju bar byed pa na cha gsum pa 'dod pa'i ma'i bya bas gsal bar byas nas rnam par 'byed par byed do //
translated: When the food is digested, the three parts are clarified by the action of the mother of desire and are separated.

original: rnam par rtog pas lus ring ba dang / thung ba dang / zlum po dang / gru bzhi'ang byed do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas lus ring ba dang / thung ba dang / zlum po dang / gru bzhi'ang byed do //
translated: Imagination makes the body long, short, round, or square.

original: rlung des ji lta ji ltar lus mngon par gsal ba dang / tshad dang / dbyibs rnams mngon par 'brel bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid du 'brel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rlung des ji lta ji ltar lus mngon par gsal ba dang / tshad dang / dbyibs rnams mngon par 'brel bar byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid du 'brel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as the wind connects the body with its manifest form, size, and shape, so consciousness is connected with various characteristics.

original: dper na / zho bska mo dang chu bud med kyis bum par sdud par byed do //🔽bsrubs pas bska mo dbu ba rdos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na / zho bska mo dang chu bud med kyis bum par sdud par byed do // bsrubs pas bska mo dbu ba rdos par 'gyur ro //
translated: curds and water are mixed by a woman in a pot.🔽When churned, the curds become froth.

original: dbu ba rdos nas 'thas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbu ba rdos nas 'thas par 'gyur ro //
translated: When the froth is churned, it becomes solid.

original: 'thas pa las mar gsar du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'thas pa las mar gsar du 'gyur ro //
translated: From the solid, fresh butter is produced.

original: de kho na bzhin du rlung yang lus la nyon mongs pa rnams thams cad dang bcas nas kun tu mngon par 'jug go /
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du rlung yang lus la nyon mongs pa rnams thams cad dang bcas nas kun tu mngon par 'jug go /
translated: In the same way, the wind, along with all the afflictions, enters the body.

original: cha lnga pas ni /
analyzed: cha lnga pas ni /
translated: By the fifth part,

original: zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / myangs par gyur pa rnams gang gi tshe lce'i rtse mo dang spu gu la rab tu brten par gyur pa'i zas rnams ngas skra rnams kyi mtha' nas bzung nas ji srid du sen mo rnams @230b la brtson 'grus kyis rnam par 'byed par byed do //
analyzed: zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / myangs par gyur pa rnams gang gi tshe lce'i rtse mo dang spu gu la rab tu brten par gyur pa'i zas rnams ngas skra rnams kyi mtha' nas bzung nas ji srid du sen mo rnams @230b la brtson 'grus kyis rnam par 'byed par byed do //
translated: when the food and drink, the things to chew and taste, are well supported at the tip of the tongue and throat, the yogi, starting from the tips of the hair, with effort, separates them up to the nails.

original: ro dang / kha dog dang / dri rnams kyang lus thams cad la byed do //
analyzed: ro dang / kha dog dang / dri rnams kyang lus thams cad la byed do //
translated: He also does it with taste, color, and smell throughout the whole body.

original: gang gi tshe yang zas steng du byed par gyur pa'i rlung 'khrugs par gyur na ni /
analyzed: gang gi tshe yang zas steng du byed par gyur pa'i rlung 'khrugs par gyur na ni /
translated: When the wind that functions above becomes disturbed,

original: des rnam par lngar chags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i las lnga byed pa yin te /
analyzed: des rnam par lngar chags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i las lnga byed pa yin te /
translated: it performs five actions that cause the five types of attachment to cease.

original: steng du dbugs 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dbugs mi 'byung bar byed do //
analyzed: steng du dbugs 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dbugs mi 'byung bar byed do //
translated: It causes the breath to cease, so that the breath does not come out.

original: des lus kyi khams rnams thams cad la lha kyog chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des lus kyi khams rnams thams cad la lha kyog chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It causes the body elements to become very stiff.

original: lhang kyog gis kyang lus yongs su btab nas 'khrugs par gyur pa'i las gsum pa byed do //
analyzed: lhang kyog gis kyang lus yongs su btab nas 'khrugs par gyur pa'i las gsum pa byed do //
translated: Having stiffened the body, it performs the third action of disturbing the body.

original: dbang po rnams thams cad dang / shes pa rnams thams cad kyang rnam par dkrugs par byas nas lus kyang 'dor bar byed do //
analyzed: dbang po rnams thams cad dang / shes pa rnams thams cad kyang rnam par dkrugs par byas nas lus kyang 'dor bar byed do //
translated: It disturbs all the faculties and all the consciousnesses, and it causes the body to be abandoned.

original: lus yong su dor bas kyang gsum 'joms par 'gyur te /
analyzed: lus yong su dor bas kyang gsum 'joms par 'gyur te /
translated: When the body is abandoned, three things are destroyed:

original: srog dang / drod dang / de nas ni rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: srog dang / drod dang / de nas ni rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: life, heat, and then consciousness.

original: 'di la tshigs su bcad pa /
analyzed: 'di la tshigs su bcad pa /
translated: Here is a verse.

original: srog drod de nas rnam par shes //
analyzed: srog drod de nas rnam par shes //
translated: Life, heat, and then consciousness.

original: gang tshe lus 'di btang ba na //
analyzed: gang tshe lus 'di btang ba na //
translated: When this body is given up,

original: ji ltar shing bzhin sa la ni //
analyzed: ji ltar shing bzhin sa la ni //
translated: like a log it falls to the ground,

original: 'gyel nas de tshe nyal ba yin //
analyzed: 'gyel nas de tshe nyal ba yin //
translated: and there it lies.

original: 'khrugs par gyur pa'i las gnyis pa yang byed do //🔽dbugs thung du 'byung bar byed kyi dbugs ring po 'byung bar ni /
analyzed: 'khrugs par gyur pa'i las gnyis pa yang byed do // dbugs thung du 'byung bar byed kyi dbugs ring po 'byung bar ni /
translated: The second agitated action is also done.

original: mi byed do //
analyzed: mi byed do //
translated: One breathes in short breaths, not long breaths.

original: de las kyang lus rnams thams cad la rgyug pa'i zug gzer chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las kyang lus rnams thams cad la rgyug pa'i zug gzer chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: From that, too, a great pain runs through all the body.

original: zug gzer gyis kyang lus yongs su btang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zug gzer gyis kyang lus yongs su btang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Because of the pain, one gives up the body.

original: 'khrugs par 'gyur ba'i las gsum pa rnams byed de /
analyzed: 'khrugs par 'gyur ba'i las gsum pa rnams byed de /
translated: The third agitated action is done:

original: dbang po rnams thams cad dang shes pa rnams @231a *//
analyzed: dbang po rnams thams cad dang shes pa rnams @231a *//
translated: all the senses and all the cognitions

original: thams cad kyang rnam par g-yeng bar byas pas 'du shes med par yang byas nas lus 'dor bar yang byed do //
analyzed: thams cad kyang rnam par g-yeng bar byas pas 'du shes med par yang byas nas lus 'dor bar yang byed do //
translated: are distracted, and having become without perception, one gives up the body.🔽The fourth agitated action is done:

original: 'khrugs par 'gyur ba'i las bzhi pa byed pa yin te; brgya lam na dbugs 'byung ba stobs dang ldan par gyur pas sam /
analyzed: 'khrugs par 'gyur ba'i las bzhi pa byed pa yin te; brgya lam na dbugs 'byung ba stobs dang ldan par gyur pas sam /
translated: sometimes, with a strong breath,

original: gal te shed na dman par gyur pas kyang lus 'dor bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: gal te shed na dman par gyur pas kyang lus 'dor bar byed pa'am /
translated: If it is weak, then one may die or be on the verge of death.

original: ma yin pa'am nyal ba'i 'du shes kyi dbugs dang ldan par gyur pas 'tsho ba 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: ma yin pa'am nyal ba'i 'du shes kyi dbugs dang ldan par gyur pas 'tsho ba 'dzin par byed do //
translated: Or, if one is in a state of sleep or unconsciousness, one may die.

original: des steng 'og gi rlung rnams rig par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do //
analyzed: des steng 'og gi rlung rnams rig par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do //
translated: In this way, by knowing the upper and lower winds, he correctly observes the body.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
translated: “The Spiritual Practitioner who carefully observes the internal body sees and understands:

original: bdag gi rlung gzhan gang dag gis 'khrugs par gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: bdag gi rlung gzhan gang dag gis 'khrugs par gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: ‘What does the wind that is disturbed in my body do?’

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or through the divine eye, he will see:

original: kun rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung lus la rab tu gnas te tshor bar gyur pa dang rdzud par yang byed do //
analyzed: kun rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung lus la rab tu gnas te tshor bar gyur pa dang rdzud par yang byed do //
translated: ‘The wind that completely fills exists in my body. If it is disturbed, it causes pain and swelling.

original: sems kyi rgyud brtan par yang byed do //
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud brtan par yang byed do //
translated: It also stabilizes the mind-stream.

original: gal te 'khrugs par gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te 'khrugs par gyur na ni /
translated: If it is disturbed,

original: des kyang sems kyi rgyun tsab hral can du byed do //🔽rnam par shes pa goms par byas pa'ang nyams par byed do //
analyzed: des kyang sems kyi rgyun tsab hral can du byed do // rnam par shes pa goms par byas pa'ang nyams par byed do //
translated: it causes the mind-stream to become scattered.🔽It causes the loss of the practice of consciousness.

original: thos pa rnams kyang gzhan du byed do //
analyzed: thos pa rnams kyang gzhan du byed do //
translated: It causes the loss of learning.

original: des mthong bar gyur pa rnams kyang mi mthong bar byed do //
analyzed: des mthong bar gyur pa rnams kyang mi mthong bar byed do //
translated: It causes the loss of what has been seen.

original: de bzhin du rna bas kyang sgra rnams mi thos par byed @231b do; ;de bzhin du dri snom par mi byed cing de bzhin du ro myang bar mi byed la de bzhin du lus kyi reg bya rnams 'dzin par mi byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin du rna bas kyang sgra rnams mi thos par byed @231b do; ;de bzhin du dri snom par mi byed cing de bzhin du ro myang bar mi byed la de bzhin du lus kyi reg bya rnams 'dzin par mi byed do //
translated: In the same way, it causes the loss of hearing sounds with the ears, smelling scents with the nose, tasting flavors with the tongue, and feeling touchable things with the body.

original: de bzhin du yid kyis chos rnams mi shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin du yid kyis chos rnams mi shes so //
translated: In the same way, it causes the loss of knowing mental objects with the mind.

original: bdag nyid rang dang gzhan rnams shes par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid rang dang gzhan rnams shes par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It causes the loss of knowing oneself and others.

original: des kun rdzogs par byed pa'i rlung rig par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do //
analyzed: des kun rdzogs par byed pa'i rlung rig par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do //
translated: “The yogī understands the body just as it is through the knowledge of the all-accomplishing wind.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
translated: Furthermore, the spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body observes,

original: bdag gi rlung gang dag gis las ci zhig byad pa yin na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi sam /
analyzed: bdag gi rlung gang dag gis las ci zhig byad pa yin na / des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi sam /
translated: “What functions do the winds perform in my body?”🔽With insight derived from hearing or by means of the divine eye,

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: he will notice,

original: sems kyi rgyud kun tu sun 'byin pa'i rlung bdag gi lus la rab tu gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud kun tu sun 'byin pa'i rlung bdag gi lus la rab tu gnas pa yin te /
translated: “The mind-stream-dissipating wind is present in my body.

original: des 'khrugs par gyur pa'am 'khrugs par ma gyur na /🔽bdag la las ci zhig byed pa yang des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: des 'khrugs par gyur pa'am 'khrugs par ma gyur na / bdag la las ci zhig byed pa yang des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: If it is disturbed or not disturbed,🔽what functions will it perform in my body?”

original: lha'i mig gis mthong ba na /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong ba na /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by means of the divine eye,🔽he will notice,

original: gal te bdag la sems kyi rgyud kun nas sun 'byin pa'i rlung 'khrugs par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te bdag la sems kyi rgyud kun nas sun 'byin pa'i rlung 'khrugs par gyur na /
translated: “If the mind-stream-dissipating wind in my body is disturbed,

original: de bdag gi sems rgyu bar byed pa'i lam kun tu sun 'byin par byed do //🔽bskyod par byed do //
analyzed: de bdag gi sems rgyu bar byed pa'i lam kun tu sun 'byin par byed do // bskyod par byed do //
translated: it will disrupt all the pathways through which my mind moves.🔽It will cause trembling,

original: rengs par byed do //
analyzed: rengs par byed do //
translated: stiffness,

original: shin tu skam par byed do //
analyzed: shin tu skam par byed do //
translated: and extreme dryness.

original: rnam par g-yeng bar yang byed do; ;kun tu rmongs par yang byed do //
analyzed: rnam par g-yeng bar yang byed do; ;kun tu rmongs par yang byed do //
translated: It causes distraction and confusion.

original: bdag gis zos par gyur pa rnams kyang lam nas yang dag par yongs su bzhu bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gis zos par gyur pa rnams kyang lam nas yang dag par yongs su bzhu bar mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: des rang gi sems rnam par g-yeng bar @232a *//

analyzed: 'gyur ro // des bdag gi sems dge ba'i chos rnams la mngon par dga' bar mi byed do //

analyzed: rtag tu'ang bdag gi lus las rdul kun tu 'byung ngo //

analyzed: bdag gi kha nas lbu ba'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: grang mor gyur pa'i reg bya rnams kyang bdag gis mi bzod do //

original: gang yang bdag gis gzugs rnams mthong bar gyur pa de dag rnams ni /
analyzed: gang yang bdag gis gzugs rnams mthong bar gyur pa de dag rnams ni /
translated: Whatever forms I see

analyzed: mi gsal bar yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: are not clear.

original: bdag gi lus po dag lci bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gi lus po dag lci bar yang 'gyur ro //

original: 'on kyang bdag la de dag la mthu stobs yang med do //
analyzed: 'on kyang bdag la de dag la mthu stobs yang med do //

original: bdag gi lus shin tu rgud par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gi lus shin tu rgud par 'gyur ro //

original: des sems sun 'byin par byed pa'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do //🔽gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
analyzed: des sems sun 'byin par byed pa'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do // gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
translated: Examining the wind that causes mental distress, he has correct understanding of the body.

original: bdag gi rlung gzhan gang dag gis 'khrugs par gyur pa dang 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin na /
analyzed: bdag gi rlung gzhan gang dag gis 'khrugs par gyur pa dang 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin na /
translated: “The spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body will also ask himself, ‘What does my wind do when it is disturbed or not disturbed?’

analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /

analyzed: 'khrugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung bdag gi lus la rab tu gnas pa yin te /

original: de gal te 'khrugs par gyur na /
analyzed: de gal te 'khrugs par gyur na /

analyzed: bdag gi rmi lam na rmi lam gyi bya ba rnams byed par mthong ngo //

original: bdag gi drod rnams thams cad shin tu grang ba'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gi drod rnams thams cad shin tu grang ba'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro //

original: grong khyer dang khang pa rnams kyang bdag gis shin tu stong par mthong ngo //
analyzed: grong khyer dang khang pa rnams kyang bdag gis shin tu stong par mthong ngo //

analyzed: bdag gi mdog skya bor 'gyur ro //

original: bdag gi lus ngag gi byed pa rnams nyung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gi lus ngag gi byed pa rnams nyung bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: mal stan la bdag gi bde ba rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: gang yang bdag gis chos rnams mngon sum du byas pa de dag rnams kyang bdag shin tu mngon par 'dod par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: bdag gis 'byung ba chen po rnams thams cad kyang kun tu 'khrug par byed do //

original: zos par gyur pa'i bdag gi 'byung ba chen po rnams thams cad dang / bzod pa rnams kyang bdag gi snying gi phyogs na kun tu gnas par 'gyur ba dang / bdag glo bur du tshor ba med par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zos par gyur pa'i bdag gi 'byung ba chen po rnams thams cad dang / bzod pa rnams kyang bdag gi snying gi phyogs na kun tu gnas par 'gyur ba dang / bdag glo bur du tshor ba med par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: All my great elements that I have consumed will be located in the region of my heart, and I will suddenly become insensate.

original: bdag gis thal ba'i phung po yang glo bur du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag gis thal ba'i phung po yang glo bur du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: I will see a heap of ashes.

original: gal te yang 'khrugs par ma gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te yang 'khrugs par ma gyur na ni /
translated: If it is not disturbed,

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i nad de dag rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i nad de dag rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the illnesses described will not occur.

original: des kun tu 'khrug par byed pa'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do //🔽gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
analyzed: des kun tu 'khrug par byed pa'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do // gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
translated: By examining the disturbing wind, he develops a correct understanding of the body.

original: bdag gi rlung gzhan dag gis 'khrugs par gyur pa dang 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin na /🔽@233a *// des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: bdag gi rlung gzhan dag gis 'khrugs par gyur pa dang 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin na / @233a *// des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: “The spiritual practitioner who carefully observes the internal body will continue to wonder, ‘When other winds are disturbed or not disturbed, what actions do they perform?’

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will notice,

original: mig 'byed pa dang 'dzum par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bdag gi rlung lus la rab tu gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: mig 'byed pa dang 'dzum par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bdag gi rlung lus la rab tu gnas pa yin te /

analyzed: de gal te 'khrugs par gyur na des bdag gi mig 'byed pa dang 'dzum par yang mi byed do //

original: de ltar yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad la rgyu ba dang / rtsa rnams thams cad la rgyu ba dang / dbang po rnams thams cad rmongs shing zhen par byed pa'i rlung myur ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar yan lag dang nying lag rnams thams cad la rgyu ba dang / rtsa rnams thams cad la rgyu ba dang / dbang po rnams thams cad rmongs shing zhen par byed pa'i rlung myur ba ni /
translated: “ ‘In this way, the wind that moves through all the major and minor body parts, that moves through all the channels, and that causes all the faculties to become confused and attached is called the swift wind.

original: bdag gis gcig kyang ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bdag gis gcig kyang ma mthong ngo //

original: 'byed pa dang 'dzum par byed pa'i rlung gal te 'khrugs par gyur na ni /
analyzed: 'byed pa dang 'dzum par byed pa'i rlung gal te 'khrugs par gyur na ni /
translated: If the wind that opens and closes is disturbed,

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i nad de dag rnams rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i nad de dag rnams rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the illnesses described will not occur.

original: 'byed pa dang 'dzum par byed pa'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: 'byed pa dang 'dzum par byed pa'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rtogs par byed do //

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te bdag gi rlung gzhan gang dag gis 'khrugs par gyur pa'am 'khrugs par ma gyur na las ci zhig byed pa yin na /🔽des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /

translated: “The spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body will also ask himself, ‘If other winds are disturbed or not disturbed, what will be the consequences of that?’

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: “With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice,

original: phan tshun kun tu dkrug par byed pa'i rlung lnga bdag la 'chi ba'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: phan tshun kun tu dkrug par byed pa'i rlung lnga bdag la 'chi ba'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: ‘At the time of my death, five winds will arise that stir things up.

original: de 'khrugs par gyur pa'am 'khrugs par @233b ma gyur pa na /
analyzed: de 'khrugs par gyur pa'am 'khrugs par @233b ma gyur pa na /
translated: If they are disturbed or not disturbed,

original: bdag 'chi bar gyur pa'i dus na las ci zhig byed par 'gyur ba yin na /🔽mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rnams kun tu 'gag par byed do //
analyzed: bdag 'chi bar gyur pa'i dus na las ci zhig byed par 'gyur ba yin na / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid rnams kun tu 'gag par byed do //
translated: what will be the consequences at the time of my death?’🔽“He will then notice, ‘They will block the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind.

original: rang rang gi yul gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang ste /
analyzed: rang rang gi yul gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang ste /
translated: They will also block the objects of the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind, which are forms, sounds, smells, tastes, textures, and mental phenomena.’

original: gal te 'khrugs par mi gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te 'khrugs par mi gyur na ni /
translated: If they do not become disturbed,

original: des bdag myur bar 'chi bar byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des bdag myur bar 'chi bar byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then I will not die quickly.

original: des phan tshun 'khrug par byed par lnga'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do //
analyzed: des phan tshun 'khrug par byed par lnga'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do //
translated: In this way, examining the five disturbing winds, he realizes the body as it is in reality.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /

original: bdag gi rlung gzhan gang dag gis 'khrugs par gyur pa dang 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin na /
analyzed: bdag gi rlung gzhan gang dag gis 'khrugs par gyur pa dang 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin na /
translated: thinks, “What does my wind element do when it is disturbed or not disturbed?”

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will notice,

original: mngal kun tu chags par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung bdag gi lus la rab tu gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: mngal kun tu chags par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung bdag gi lus la rab tu gnas pa yin te /
translated: “The womb-forming wind is present in my body.

original: des bdag dang po mngal du skyes par gyur pa na; gal te tha mal pa'i las kyi rkyen gyis bdag nur nur po'i nang du des srog dang 'brel bar byed do //
analyzed: des bdag dang po mngal du skyes par gyur pa na; gal te tha mal pa'i las kyi rkyen gyis bdag nur nur po'i nang du des srog dang 'brel bar byed do //
translated: If, due to the conditions of ordinary karma, I am born in the womb, then if I am in the kalala stage, he will take my life.

analyzed: nur nur po la gnas par gyur pa na / gal te yang srog dang bral bar ma gyur na mer mer po la gnas pa na 'bral bar mi byed do //

analyzed: nar nar po la gnas par gyur na yang 'bral bar mi byed do //

analyzed: des lus kyi cha shas rnams thams cad dod pa na 'bral bar byed do // yan lag @234a *//

original: dang nying lag rnams thams cad 'gyus pa la ni /
analyzed: dang nying lag rnams thams cad 'gyus pa la ni /
translated: If all my major and minor body parts are formed,

original: srog 'phrog par mi byed do //
analyzed: srog 'phrog par mi byed do //
translated: he will not take my life.

original: des bdag gi dbang po rnams dod par byas nas 'phrog par byed do //
analyzed: des bdag gi dbang po rnams dod par byas nas 'phrog par byed do //

analyzed: skye ba gzhan gang yang rung ba rnams la ji lta ji ltar srog gcod pa shin tu lci ba rnams byas par gyur na /

analyzed: de lta de ltar 'di'i mngal nas bzung nas shin tu myur bar srog dang bral bar byed do //

original: gal te yang 'dis skye ba gzhan gang yang rung ba rnams su srog gcod pa ma byas par gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te yang 'dis skye ba gzhan gang yang rung ba rnams su srog gcod pa ma byas par gyur na ni /

original: 'chi bar 'gyur pa ji skad du bshad pa de dag rnams shin tu myur bar 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'chi bar 'gyur pa ji skad du bshad pa de dag rnams shin tu myur bar 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then the conditions that lead to death as just described will not occur so quickly.

original: des mngal 'phel bar byed pa'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do //🔽gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te /🔽bdag gi rlung gzhan gang dag gis 'khrugs par gyur pa dang / 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin na; des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: des mngal 'phel bar byed pa'i rlung la so sor brtags par gyur pas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus so sor rig par byed do // gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa nang gi bdag nyid kyi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te / bdag gi rlung gzhan gang dag gis 'khrugs par gyur pa dang / 'khrugs par ma gyur pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin na; des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: In this way, examining the womb-increasing wind, he develops a correct understanding of the body.

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: “The spiritual practitioner who carefully considers and attends to the internal body will further wonder, ‘If the winds in my body are disturbed or not disturbed, what functions will they perform?’ With insight derived from hearing or by seeing with the divine eye, he will then notice🔽that there is a wind called womb-increasing.

original: mngal 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung lus la gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: mngal 'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rlung lus la gnas pa yin te /

original: de 'khrugs pa'am ma 'khrugs pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin na /
analyzed: de 'khrugs pa'am ma 'khrugs pa na las ci zhig byed pa yin na /

original: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
analyzed: des thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis sam /
translated: With insight derived from hearing

original: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
analyzed: lha'i mig gis mthong bar gyur pa /
translated: or through the divine eye one sees:

analyzed: gal te bdag gi mngal 'jig par @234b byed pa'i rlung 'khrugs par gyur na /
translated: If the wind that destroys the womb is disturbed,

original: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa'i rkyen dang ldan pas rang bzhin sun 'byin par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pas log par g-yem pa'i rkyen dang ldan pas rang bzhin sun 'byin par byed pa yin te /
